	,			CAST(pha.[FROM_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE] AS NVARCHAR(255))																		AS [From Type Lookup Code]
	,			CAST(pha.[FOB_LOOKUP_CODE] AS NVARCHAR(255))																			AS [Sustainability Position]			
	,			CAST(LEFT(pha.[ATTRIBUTE_DATE1],10)	 AS NVARCHAR(255))																AS [Deal Date]		
	,			CAST(pha.[ATTRIBUTE5] AS NVARCHAR(255))																				AS [Transporter Name]	
	,			CAST(pha.[ATTRIBUTE_NUMBER2] AS NVARCHAR(255))																			AS [Transporter Unit Price]	
	,			CAST(pha.[ATTRIBUTE9] AS NVARCHAR(255))																				AS [FFA Spec]				
	,			CAST(pha.[ATTRIBUTE_NUMBER3] AS NVARCHAR(255))																			AS [Transporter Amount]		
	,			CAST(pha.[ATTRIBUTE18] AS NVARCHAR(255))																				AS [Ultimo Order]		
	,			CAST(pha.[ATTRIBUTE12] AS NVARCHAR(255))																				AS [Transporter Currency]		
	,			CAST(pha.[ATTRIBUTE7] AS NVARCHAR(255))																				AS [Additional Charges 1 Supplier]	
	,			CAST(pha.[ATTRIBUTE_NUMBER4] AS NVARCHAR(255))																			AS [Additional Charges 1 Unit Price]
	,			CAST(pha.[ATTRIBUTE_NUMBER5] AS NVARCHAR(255))																			AS [Additional Charges 1 Amount]
	,			CAST(pha.[ATTRIBUTE13] AS NVARCHAR(255))																				AS [Additional Charges 1 Currency]
	,			CAST(pha.[ATTRIBUTE17] AS NVARCHAR(255))																				AS [Additional Charges 1 Description]
	,			CAST(pha.[ATTRIBUTE12] AS NVARCHAR(255))																				AS [Additional Charges 2 Supplier]
	,			CAST(pha.[ATTRIBUTE_NUMBER6] AS NVARCHAR(255))																			AS [Additional Charges 2 Unit Price]
	--,			pha.[ATTRIBUTE_NUMBER7]																		AS [Additional Charges 2 Amount]
	,			NULL																						AS [Additional Charges 2 Amount]
	,			CAST(pha.[ATTRIBUTE15] AS NVARCHAR(255))																				AS [Additional Charges 2 Currency]
	,			CAST(pla.[PO_LINE_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))																				AS [PO Line ID]
	,			CAST(pla.[FROM_HEADER_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))																			AS [From Header ID]
	,			CAST(pla.[PRC_BU_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))																					AS [Procurement BU ID]
	,			CAST(pla.[LINE_STATUS] AS NVARCHAR(255))																				AS [Line Status]
	,			CAST(pla.[LINE_NUM] AS NVARCHAR(255))																					AS [Line Number]
	,			CAST(pla.[ITEM_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))																					AS [Item ID]
	,			CAST(pla.[CATEGORY_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))																				AS [Category ID]
	,			CAST(pla.[ITEM_DESCRIPTION]	 AS NVARCHAR(255))																		AS [Item Description]
	,			CAST(pla.[UOM_CODE] AS NVARCHAR(255))																					AS [UOM Code]
	,			CAST(CASE WHEN pla.[UNIT_PRICE] IS NULL THEN '0' ELSE pla.[UNIT_PRICE] END AS NUMERIC(28,2))AS [Unit Price]
	,			CAST(pla.[QUANTITY]	 AS NVARCHAR(255))																				AS [Ordered Quantity]
	,			CAST(pla.[FROM_LINE_ID]	 AS NVARCHAR(255))																			AS [From Line ID]
	,			CAST(pla.[VENDOR_PRODUCT_NUM] AS NVARCHAR(255))																		AS [Supplier Item]
	,			CAST(pla.[QUANTITY_COMMITTED] AS NVARCHAR(255))																		AS [Blanket Agreement Quantity]	
	,			CAST(pla.[CLOSED_DATE] AS NVARCHAR(255))																				AS [Closed Date]
	,			CAST(pla.[CANCEL_REASON] AS NVARCHAR(255))																				AS [Cancel Reason]
	INTO		[Core].[PurchaseOrders]
	FROM		[RAW].[O.PO_HEADERS_ALL] pha					
	LEFT JOIN	[RAW].[O.PO_LINES_ALL] pla				
	ON			pla.[PO_HEADER_ID] = pha.[PO_HEADER_ID]
	WHERE		pha.[TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE] = 'STANDARD'


/********************************************************************************************************
	Step 1.10:	Create core sales contracts table.

				Core.SalesContracts is built by joining the tables [RAW].[O.OKC_K_HEADERS_ALL_B],
				[RAW].[O.OKC_K_HEADERS_TL], [RAW].[O.OKC_K_LINES_B], [RAW].[O.OKC_K_LINES_TL], 
				[RAW].[O.OKC_K_PARTY_ROLES_B] and [RAW].[O.QP_PRICING_TERMS_B] 


				[RAW].[O.OKC_K_PARTY_ROLES_B] is joined twice. In the first join it is filtered for
				[RLE_CODE] = 'SUPPLIER' to bring through the supplier details. In the second join it
				is filtered for [RLE_CODE] = 'CUSTOMER' to bring through the customer details.

********************************************************************************************************/

	IF OBJECT_ID('[Core].[SalesContracts]','U') IS NOT NULL
		DROP TABLE [Core].[SalesContracts]
		
	SELECT		CAST(sch.[ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))								AS [Contract Header ID]
	,			CAST(sch.[MAJOR_VERSION] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Sales Contract Version]
	,			CAST(sch.[CONTRACT_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Contract ID]
	,			CAST(sch.[ATTRIBUTE10] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Customer Bill To]
	,			CAST(sch.[ATTRIBUTE11] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Customer Ship To]
	,			CAST(sch.[ATTRIBUTE16] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Shipping Method]
	,			CAST(sch.[VERSION_TYPE]	 AS NVARCHAR(255))					AS [Version Type]
	,			CAST(sch.[CONTRACT_NUMBER] AS NVARCHAR(255))					AS [Sales Contract Number]
	,			CAST(sch.[CONTRACT_TYPE_ID]	 AS NVARCHAR(255))				AS [Contract Type ID]
	,			CAST(sch.[ORG_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))							AS [Business Unit]
	,			CAST(sch.[STS_CODE] AS NVARCHAR(255))							AS [Sales Contract Status]
	,			CAST(sch.[CURRENCY_CODE] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Currency Code]
	,			CAST(sch.[START_DATE] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Sales Contract Start Date]
	,			CAST(sch.[END_DATE]	 AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Sales Contract End Date]
	,			CAST(sch.[LEGAL_ENTITY_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))					AS [Legal Entity ID]
	,			CAST(sch.[PRICING_STRATEGY_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))				AS [Pricing Strategy ID]
	,			CAST(sch.[ATTRIBUTE14] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Payment Term]
	,			CAST(sch.[AMENDMENT_EFFECTIVE_DATE] AS NVARCHAR(255))			AS [Ammendment Effective Date]
	,			CAST(sch.[APPROVAL_NOTE] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Approval Note]
	,			CAST(sch.[ATTRIBUTE7] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [VET ID]
	,			CAST(sch.[DATE_APPROVED] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Date Approved]
	,			CAST(sch.[ATTRIBUTE1] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Transporter]
	,			CAST(sch.[ATTRIBUTE_NUMBER1] AS NVARCHAR(255))					AS [Transporter Unit Price]
	,			CAST(sch.[ATTRIBUTE2] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Additional Charges 1 Supplier]
	,			CAST(sch.[ATTRIBUTE_NUMBER2] AS NVARCHAR(255))					AS [Additional Charges 1 Unit Price]
	,			CAST(sch.[TRN_CODE]	 AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Termination reason]
	,			CAST(sch.[DATE_TERMINATED] AS NVARCHAR(255))					AS [Terminated Date]
	,			CAST(sch.[ATTRIBUTE3] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Disposal Method]
	,			CAST(sch.[ATTRIBUTE4] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Waste Stream Number]
	,			CAST(sch.[ATTRIBUTE5] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Waste Description]
	,			CAST(sch.[ATTRIBUTE_NUMBER3] AS NVARCHAR(255))					AS [Transporter Amount]
	,			CAST(sch.[ATTRIBUTE12] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Transporter Currency]
	,			CAST(LEFT(sch.[ATTRIBUTE_DATE1],10) AS NVARCHAR(255))			AS [Deal Date]
	,			CAST(sch.[ATTRIBUTE6] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Sustainability Position]
	,			CAST(sch.[ATTRIBUTE15] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Sustainability Position Details]
	,			CAST(sch.[COMMITMENT_AMOUNT] AS NVARCHAR(255))					AS [Commitment Amount]
	,			CAST(sch.[DATETIME_CANCELLED] AS NVARCHAR(255))				AS [Cancelled Date]
	,			CAST(sch.[ATTRIBUTE19] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Additional Charges 1 Description]
	,			CAST(sch.[ATTRIBUTE13] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Additional Charges 1 Currency]
	,			CAST(sch.[ATTRIBUTE21] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Allow Multiple Shipping Addresses]
	,			CAST(sch.[ATTRIBUTE17] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Additional Charges 2 Supplier]
	,			CAST(sch.[ATTRIBUTE20] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Additional Charges 2 Description]
	,			CAST(sch.[ATTRIBUTE_NUMBER5] AS NVARCHAR(255))					AS [Additional Charges 2 Unit Price]
	,			CAST(sch.[ATTRIBUTE_NUMBER6] AS NVARCHAR(255))					AS [Additional Charges 2 Amount]
	,			CAST(sch.[ATTRIBUTE_NUMBER4] AS NVARCHAR(255))					AS [Additional Charges 1 Amount]
	,			CAST(sch.[ATTRIBUTE18] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Additional Charges 2 Currency]
	,			CAST(sct.[LANGUAGE]	 AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Language]
	,			CAST(sct.[DESCRIPTION] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Description]
	,			CAST(sct.[COGNOMEN] AS NVARCHAR(255))							AS [Trader]
	,			CAST(sct.[VERSION_DESCRIPTION]	 AS NVARCHAR(255))			AS [Additional Description]
	,			CAST(scl.[ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))								AS [Line ID]
	--,			CAST(scl.[LINE_ID]						AS [Line ID 2]
	,			CAST(scl.[LINE_NUMBER] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Line Number]
	,			CAST(scl.[LINE_TYPE_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Line Type ID]
	,			CAST(LEFT(scl.[START_DATE],10) AS NVARCHAR(255))				AS [Line Start Date]
	,			CAST(LEFT(scl.[END_DATE],10) AS NVARCHAR(255))					AS [Line End Date]
	,			CAST(scl.[STS_CODE]	 AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Sts Code]
	,			CAST(scl.[UOM_CODE]	 AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [UOM Code]
	,			CAST(scl.[PRICE_LIST_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Price List ID]
	,			CAST(scl.[AGREED_QTY] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Line Quantity]
	,			CAST(scl.[ATTRIBUTE3] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Incoterm]
	,			CAST(scl.[AGREED_AMT] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Line Amount]
	,			CAST(scl.[ATTRIBUTE7] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Quality]
	,			CAST(scl.[ATTRIBUTE2] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Tolerance]
	,			CAST(scl.[ATTRIBUTE6] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Sustainability Contact]
	,			CAST(scl.[ATTRIBUTE9] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Nomination]
	,			CAST(scl.[ATTRIBUTE10] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Nomination Requirement]
	,			CAST(scl.[ATTRIBUTE11] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Lay Time]
	,			CAST(scl.[ATTRIBUTE12] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Inspection]
	,			CAST(scl.[ATTRIBUTE14] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Demurrage Vessel]
	,			CAST(scl.[ATTRIBUTE15] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Legislation]
	,			CAST(scl.[ATTRIBUTE4] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Laycan]
	,			CAST(scl.[ATTRIBUTE8] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Temperature]
	,			CAST(scl.[ATTRIBUTE13] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Detenation Demurrage]
	,			CAST(sclt.[ITEM_NAME] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Item Name]
	,			CAST(sup.[ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))								AS [Supplier Party Role ID]
	,			CAST(sup.[OBJECT1_ID1] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Sales Contract Supplier]
	,			CAST(cus.[ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))								AS [Customer Party Role ID]
	,			CAST(cus.[OBJECT1_ID1] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Sales Contract Customer]
	,			CAST(scpt.[PRICING_TERM_ID]	 AS NVARCHAR(255))				AS [Pricing Term ID]
	,			CAST(scpt.[PARENT_ENTITY_TYPE_CODE] AS NVARCHAR(255))			AS [Parent Entity Type Code]
	,			CAST(scpt.[PARENT_ENTITY_KEY_COLUMN1] AS NVARCHAR(255))		AS [Parent Entity Key Column 1]
	,			CAST(scpt.[PARENT_ENTITY_KEY_COLUMN2] AS NVARCHAR(255))		AS [Parent Entity Key Column 2]
	,			CAST(scpt.[PARENT_ENTITY_KEY_COLUMN3] AS NVARCHAR(255))		AS [Parent Entity Key Column 3]
	,			CAST(scpt.[PARENT_ENTITY_KEY_COLUMN4] AS NVARCHAR(255))		AS [Parent Entity Key Column 4]
	,			CAST(scpt.[PARENT_ENTITY_KEY_COLUMN5] AS NVARCHAR(255))		AS [List Price]
	,			CAST(scpt.[ITEM_ID]	 AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Item ID]
	,			CAST(scpt.[PRICING_CURRENCY_CODE] AS NVARCHAR(255))			AS [Pricing Currency Code]
	,			CAST(scpt.[PRICING_UOM_CODE] AS NVARCHAR(255))					AS [Pricing UOM Code]
	,			CAST(scpt.[ADJUSTMENT_AMOUNT] AS NVARCHAR(255))				AS [Agreement Price]
	INTO		[Core].[SalesContracts]
	FROM		[RAW].[O.OKC_K_HEADERS_ALL_B] sch				
	LEFT JOIN	[RAW].[O.OKC_K_HEADERS_TL] sct				
	ON			sch.[ID] = sct.[ID]
	AND			sch.[MAJOR_VERSION] = sct.[MAJOR_VERSION]
	LEFT JOIN	[RAW].[O.OKC_K_LINES_B] scl
	ON			sch.[ID] = scl.[CHR_ID]
	AND			sch.[MAJOR_VERSION] = scl.[MAJOR_VERSION]
	LEFT JOIN	[RAW].[O.OKC_K_LINES_TL] sclt
	ON			scl.[ID] = sclt.[ID]
	AND			scl.[MAJOR_VERSION] = sclt.[MAJOR_VERSION]
	LEFT JOIN	(
					SELECT		*
					FROM		[RAW].[O.OKC_K_PARTY_ROLES_B]
					WHERE		[RLE_CODE] = 'SUPPLIER'
				) sup	
	ON			sch.[ID] = sup.[CHR_ID]
	AND			sch.[MAJOR_VERSION] = sup.[MAJOR_VERSION]
	LEFT JOIN	(
					SELECT		*
					FROM		[RAW].[O.OKC_K_PARTY_ROLES_B]
					WHERE		[RLE_CODE] = 'CUSTOMER'
				) cus	
	ON			sch.[ID] = cus.[CHR_ID]
	AND			sch.[MAJOR_VERSION] = cus.[MAJOR_VERSION]
	LEFT JOIN	[RAW].[O.QP_PRICING_TERMS_B] scpt
	ON			scpt.[PARENT_ENTITY_KEY_COLUMN1] = sch.[ID]
	AND			scpt.[PARENT_ENTITY_KEY_COLUMN2] = scl.[ID]
	AND			scpt.[PARENT_ENTITY_KEY_COLUMN3] = sch.[MAJOR_VERSION]


/********************************************************************************************************
	Step 1.11:	Create core sales orders fulfilled table.

				Core.SalesOrders_Fulfilled is built using the table [RAW].[O.DOO_FULFILL_LINES_ALL]

********************************************************************************************************/

	IF OBJECT_ID('[Core].[SalesOrders_Fulfilled]','U') IS NOT NULL
		DROP TABLE [Core].[SalesOrders_Fulfilled]

	SELECT		CAST([CANCELED_FLAG] AS NVARCHAR(255))					AS [CANCELED_FLAG]
	,			CAST([CARRIER_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))					AS [CARRIER_ID]
	,			CAST([FULFILL_ORG_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))				AS [FULFILL_ORG_ID]
	,			CAST([HEADER_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [HEADER_ID]
	,			CAST([OPEN_FLAG] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [OPEN_FLAG]
	,			CAST([ORG_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [ORG_ID]
	,			CAST([PAYMENT_TERM_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))				AS [PAYMENT_TERM_ID]
	,			CAST([REQUEST_SHIP_DATE] AS NVARCHAR(255))				AS [REQUEST_SHIP_DATE]
	,			CAST([SOURCE_ORDER_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))				AS [SOURCE_ORDER_ID]
	,			CAST([SOURCE_ORDER_NUMBER] AS NVARCHAR(255))			AS [SOURCE_ORDER_NUMBER]
	,			CAST([SOURCE_ORG_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))					AS [SOURCE_ORG_ID]
	,			CAST([STATUS_CODE] AS NVARCHAR(255))					AS [STATUS_CODE]
	,			CAST([FULFILL_LINE_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))				AS [FULFILL_LINE_ID]
	,			CAST([LINE_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [LINE_ID]
	,			CAST([FULFILL_LINE_NUMBER] AS NVARCHAR(255))			AS [FULFILL_LINE_NUMBER]
	,			CAST([INVENTORY_ITEM_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))				AS [INVENTORY_ITEM_ID]
	,			CAST([ITEM_TYPE_CODE] AS NVARCHAR(255))				AS [ITEM_TYPE_CODE]
	,			CAST(ISNULL([ORDERED_QTY],'0') AS NVARCHAR(255))	AS [ORDERED_QTY]
	,			CAST([SOURCE_LINE_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))							AS [SOURCE_LINE_ID]
	,			CAST([SOURCE_LINE_NUMBER] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [SOURCE_LINE_NUMBER]
	,			CAST([SOURCE_SCHEDULE_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [SOURCE_SCHEDULE_ID]
	,			CAST([SOURCE_SCHEDULE_NUMBER] AS NVARCHAR(255))					AS [SOURCE_SCHEDULE_NUMBER]
	,			CAST([ORDERED_UOM] AS NVARCHAR(255))								AS [ORDERED_UOM]
	,			CAST([INVOICE_INTERFACED_FLAG] AS NVARCHAR(255))					AS [INVOICE_INTERFACED_FLAG]
	,			CAST([BILL_TO_CUSTOMER_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [BILL_TO_CUSTOMER_ID]
	,			CAST([BILL_TO_SITE_USE_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [BILL_TO_SITE_USE_ID]
	,			CAST([UNIT_SELLING_PRICE] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [UNIT_SELLING_PRICE]
	,			CAST([INVENTORY_ORGANIZATION_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))					AS [INVENTORY_ORGANIZATION_ID]
	,			CAST([SHIP_TO_PARTY_ID]	 AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [SHIP_TO_PARTY_ID]
	,			CAST([SHIP_TO_PARTY_SITE_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [SHIP_TO_PARTY_SITE_ID]
	,			CAST([ITEM_SUB_TYPE_CODE] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [ITEM_SUB_TYPE_CODE]
	,			CAST([DEFAULT_TAXATION_COUNTRY]	 AS NVARCHAR(255))				AS [DEFAULT_TAXATION_COUNTRY]
	,			CAST([PRODUCT_TYPE]	 AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [PRODUCT_TYPE]
	,			CAST([TRX_BUSINESS_CATEGORY] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [TRX_BUSINESS_CATEGORY]
	,			CAST([ASSESSABLE_VALUE] AS NVARCHAR(255))							AS [ASSESSABLE_VALUE]
	,			CAST([PURCHASING_ENABLED_FLAG] AS NVARCHAR(255))					AS [PURCHASING_ENABLED_FLAG]
	,			CAST([APPLIED_PRICE_LIST_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [APPLIED_PRICE_LIST_ID]
	,			CAST([CHANGE_ELIGIBLE_FLAG]	 AS NVARCHAR(255))					AS [CHANGE_ELIGIBLE_FLAG]
	,			CAST([MODIFIED_FLAG] AS NVARCHAR(255))								AS [MODIFIED_FLAG]
	,			CAST([UNREFERENCED_RETURN_FLAG]	 AS NVARCHAR(255))				AS [UNREFERENCED_RETURN_FLAG]
	,			CAST([UNIT_QUANTITY] AS NVARCHAR(255))								AS [UNIT_QUANTITY]
	,			CAST([PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID]
	,			CAST([PROCESS_NUMBER] AS NVARCHAR(255))							AS [PROCESS_NUMBER]
	,			CAST([TRANSPORTATION_PLANNED_FLAG] AS NVARCHAR(255))				AS [TRANSPORTATION_PLANNED_FLAG]
	,			CAST([ASSET_TRACKED_FLAG] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [ASSET_TRACKED_FLAG]
	,			CAST([PRJ_REC_INDICATOR] AS NVARCHAR(255))							AS [PRJ_REC_INDICATOR]
	,			CAST([MDO_FLAG]	 AS NVARCHAR(255))								AS [MDO_FLAG]
	,			CAST([FULFILL_INSTANCE_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [FULFILL_INSTANCE_ID]
	,			CAST(ISNULL([FULFILLED_QTY],'0') AS NVARCHAR(255))		AS [FULFILLED_QTY]
	,			CAST([CANCELED_QTY] AS NVARCHAR(255))				AS [CANCELED_QTY]
	,			CAST([SHIPPING_INSTRUCTIONS] AS NVARCHAR(255))		AS [SHIPPING_INSTRUCTIONS]
	,			CAST([REFERENCE_FLINE_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))			AS [REFERENCE_FLINE_ID]
	,			CAST([PACKING_INSTRUCTIONS] AS NVARCHAR(255))		AS [PACKING_INSTRUCTIONS]
	,			CAST([CUSTOMER_PO_NUMBER] AS NVARCHAR(255))			AS [CUSTOMER_PO_NUMBER]
	,			CAST(ISNULL([RMA_DELIVERED_QTY],'0') AS NVARCHAR(255))	AS [RMA_DELIVERED_QTY]
	,			CAST([AGREEMENT_HEADER_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))			AS [AGREEMENT_HEADER_ID]
	,			CAST([AGREEMENT_LINE_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))				AS [AGREEMENT_LINE_ID]
	,			CAST([AGREEMENT_VERSION_NUMBER] AS NVARCHAR(255))		AS [AGREEMENT_VERSION_NUMBER]
	INTO		[Core].[SalesOrders_Fulfilled]
	FROM		[RAW].[O.DOO_FULFILL_LINES_ALL]


/********************************************************************************************************
	Step 1.12:	Create core on hand balance table.

				Core.OnHandBalance is built by joining the tables [RAW].[O.INV_ONHAND_QUANTITIES_DETAIL],
				[Core].[Items] and [Core].[Organizations]
********************************************************************************************************/

	IF OBJECT_ID('[Core].[OnHandBalance]','U') IS NOT NULL
		DROP TABLE [Core].[OnHandBalance]

	SELECT		o.[Business Unit Name] 
	,			o.[Inventory Organization Name] 
	,			CAST(oq.[INVENTORY_ITEM_ID]	 AS NVARCHAR(255))										AS [Item ID]
	,			CAST(oq.[ORGANIZATION_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))											AS [Inventory Organization ID]
	,			CAST(oq.[PRIMARY_TRANSACTION_QUANTITY] AS NUMERIC(28,4))		AS [Primary Transaction Quantity]
	,			CAST(oq.[SUBINVENTORY_CODE] AS NVARCHAR(255))											AS [Subinventory]
	,			CAST(oq.[ONHAND_QUANTITIES_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))										AS [Onhand Quantities ID]
	,			CAST(oq.[TRANSACTION_UOM_CODE]	 AS NVARCHAR(255))									AS [Transaction UOM Code]
	,			CAST(oq.[LOT_NUMBER] AS NVARCHAR(255))													AS [Lot Number]
	,			i.[Item Code]
	,			i.[Item Name]
	,			i.[Category Set Name]
	,			i.[Category Code]
	,			i.[Category Set Description]
	INTO		[Core].[OnHandBalance]
	FROM		[RAW].[O.INV_ONHAND_QUANTITIES_DETAIL] oq
	LEFT JOIN	[Core].[Items] i
	ON			oq.[INVENTORY_ITEM_ID] = i.[Inventory Item ID]
	AND			oq.[ORGANIZATION_ID] = i.[Organization ID]
	LEFT JOIN	[Core].[Organizations] o
	ON			oq.[ORGANIZATION_ID] = o.[Organization ID]



/********************************************************************************************************
	Step 1.13:	Create core receiving transactions table.

				Core.ReceivingTransactions is built using the table [RAW].[O.RCV_TRANSACTIONS]
********************************************************************************************************/

	IF OBJECT_ID('[Core].[ReceivingTransactions]','U') IS NOT NULL
		DROP TABLE [Core].[ReceivingTransactions]

	SELECT		CAST([TRANSACTION_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))				AS [Transaction ID]
	,			CAST([SHIP_FROM_LOCATION_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))			AS [Ship From Location ID]
	,			CAST([ORGANIZATION_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))				AS [Organization ID]
	,			CAST([CREATED_BY] AS NVARCHAR(255))					AS [Created By]
	,			CAST([TRANSACTION_TYPE] AS NVARCHAR(255))				AS [Transaction Type]
	,			CAST([TRANSACTION_DATE] AS NVARCHAR(255))				AS [Transaction Date]
	,			CAST([SHIPMENT_HEADER_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))			AS [Shipment Header ID]
	,			CAST([SHIPMENT_LINE_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))				AS [Shipment Line ID]
	,			CAST([SOURCE_DOCUMENT_CODE] AS NVARCHAR(255))			AS [Source Document Code]
	,			CAST([DESTINATION_TYPE_CODE] AS NVARCHAR(255))			AS [Destination Type Code]
	,			CAST([PRIMARY_QUANTITY]	 AS NVARCHAR(255))			AS [Primary Quantity]
	,			CAST([PRIMARY_UOM_CODE]	 AS NVARCHAR(255))			AS [Primary UOM Code]
	,			CAST([EMPLOYEE_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))					AS [Employee ID]
	,			CAST([PARENT_TRANSACTION_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))			AS [Parent Transaction ID]
	,			CAST([PO_HEADER_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))					AS [PO Header ID]
	,			CAST([PO_LINE_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))					AS [PO Line ID]
	,			CAST([PO_LINE_LOCATION_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))			AS [PO Line Location ID]
	,			CAST([PO_DISTRIBUTION_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))			AS [PO Distribution ID]
	,			CAST([PO_REVISION_NUM] AS NVARCHAR(255))				AS [PO Revision Num]
	,			CAST([DELIVER_TO_PERSON_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))			AS [Deliver To Person ID]
	,			CAST([DELIVER_TO_LOCATION_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))		AS [Deliver To Location ID]
	,			CAST([VENDOR_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Vendor ID]
	,			CAST([VENDOR_SITE_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))				AS [Vendor Site ID]
	,			CAST([LOCATION_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))					AS [Location ID]
	,			CAST([DESTINATION_CONTEXT] AS NVARCHAR(255))			AS [Destination Context]
	,			CAST([INTERFACE_TRANSACTION_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))		AS [Interface Transaction ID]
	,			CAST([GROUP_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Group ID]
	,			CAST([SUBINVENTORY]	 AS NVARCHAR(255))				AS [Subinventory]
	,			CAST([FROM_SUBINVENTORY] AS NVARCHAR(255))				AS [From Subinventory]
	,			CAST([ATTRIBUTE1] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [ATTRIBUTE1]
	,			CAST([ATTRIBUTE2] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [ATTRIBUTE2]
	,			CAST([ATTRIBUTE4] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [ATTRIBUTE4]
	,			CAST([ATTRIBUTE_NUMBER1] AS NVARCHAR(255))				AS [ATTRIBUTE_NUMBER1]
	,			CAST([ATTRIBUTE_NUMBER2] AS NVARCHAR(255))				AS [ATTRIBUTE_NUMBER2]
	,			CAST([ATTRIBUTE_NUMBER3] AS NVARCHAR(255))				AS [ATTRIBUTE_NUMBER3]
	,			CAST([ATTRIBUTE_NUMBER8] AS NVARCHAR(255))				AS [ATTRIBUTE_NUMBER8]
	,			CAST([ATTRIBUTE_TIMESTAMP1] AS NVARCHAR(255))			AS [ATTRIBUTE_TIMESTAMP1]
	,			CAST([ATTRIBUTE_TIMESTAMP2] AS NVARCHAR(255))			AS [ATTRIBUTE_TIMESTAMP2]
	,			CAST([PO_UNIT_PRICE] AS NVARCHAR(255))					AS [PO Unit Price]
	,			CAST([CURRENCY_CONVERSION_RATE] AS NVARCHAR(255))		AS [Currency Conversion Rate]
	,			CAST([QUANTITY_BILLED] AS NVARCHAR(255))				AS [Quantity Billed]
	,			CAST([AMOUNT_BILLED] AS NVARCHAR(255))					AS [Amount Billed]
	,			CAST([ATTRIBUTE_NUMBER7] AS NVARCHAR(255))				AS [ATTRIBUTE_NUMBER7]
	,			CAST([FINAL_DISCHARGE_LOCATION_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))	AS [Final Discharge Location ID]
	,			CAST([TRANSFER_ORDER_HEADER_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))		AS [Transfer Order Header ID]
	,			CAST([TRANSFER_ORDER_LINE_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))		AS [Transfer Order Line ID]
	,			CAST([REASON_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Reason ID]
	,			CAST([RECEIPT_ADVICE_HEADER_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))		AS [Receipt Advice Header ID]
	INTO		[Core].[ReceivingTransactions]
	FROM		[RAW].[O.RCV_TRANSACTIONS]


/********************************************************************************************************
	Step 1.14:	Create core FX rates table.

				Core.FXRates is built using the [RAW].[O.GL_DAILY_RATES] table. 
********************************************************************************************************/


	IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#tempfx') IS NOT NULL
		DROP TABLE #tempfx

	SELECT		
				fx.[CONVERSION_DATE]
	,			CAST(CASE WHEN [FROM_CURRENCY] = 'EUR' and [TO_CURRENCY] = 'GBP'
					THEN LEFT([CONVERSION_RATE],7) END AS NUMERIC(28,4))					AS [EUR GBP]
	,			CAST(CASE WHEN [FROM_CURRENCY] = 'EUR' and [TO_CURRENCY] = 'USD'
					THEN [CONVERSION_RATE] END AS NUMERIC(28,4))							AS [EUR USD]
	INTO		#tempfx
	FROM		[RAW].[O.GL_DAILY_RATES] fx
	WHERE		[FROM_CURRENCY] = 'EUR'
	and			[TO_CURRENCY] IN ('GBP','USD')
	GROUP BY	[CONVERSION_DATE], [FROM_CURRENCY], [TO_CURRENCY], [CONVERSION_RATE]


	IF OBJECT_ID('[Core].[FXRates]','U') IS NOT NULL
	DROP TABLE [Core].[FXRates]

	SELECT
				[CONVERSION_DATE]
	,			CASE WHEN AVG([EUR GBP]) > 2 
					THEN (AVG([EUR GBP]))/10 
					ELSE AVG([EUR GBP])													END	AS [EUR GBP]
	,			AVG([EUR USD])																AS [EUR USD]
	INTO		[Core].[FXRates]
	FROM		#tempfx
	GROUP BY	[CONVERSION_DATE]

activities.name: Exposure And Position Data Marks Script

scripts.text:
/*==============================================================================================================================*
 * Project:		Argent																											*
 * Purpose:		Create data marts that feed in to Exposure and Position reports													*
 * Description:	1) Creates purchase contract, sales contract and inventory tables from Core tables created in previous script.	*
 *				2) Create formatted versions of the yield, blended sales and exposure limit tables for use in the reports		*																							*
 *																																*
 *																																*
 *																																*
 * Prerequisites: CoreTables.sql script produces the core tables			 													*
 *																																*
 * Outputs: Tables "Trade.PurchaseContracts"; "Trade.SalesContracts"; "Trade.InventoryOnHandBalance";							*
 *			"Trade.BlendedSales"; "Trade.Yield"; "Trade.ExposureLimits"															*
 *																																*
 * Impact: If the trade tables are appended to,																					*
 *		   then the SQL to Blob pipeline must be re-run																			*
 *																																*
 * Date:        29/07/2022																										*
 * Version:     1.0																												*																			
 *==============================================================================================================================*
 * Updates:																														*
 * Date		| Version | Author		| Change made																				*
 * -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*
 * --/--/-- |  1.-	  |				|																							*
 *			|		  |				|																							*
 *==============================================================================================================================*/

 /********************************************************************************************************
	Step 2.1:	Delete current day's data from the final tables. This ensures that if the script is run more
				than once in one day there is no duplicated data.
********************************************************************************************************/

	DECLARE @DeleteTableStatement NVARCHAR(MAX)
	DECLARE Cur2 CURSOR READ_ONLY
	FOR
			SELECT  'Delete from [Trade].[' + TABLE_NAME + ']  where CAST([DateStamp] AS DATE) = CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE)'
			FROM    INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES
			WHERE   TABLE_SCHEMA = 'Trade'
			AND		TABLE_TYPE = 'BASE TABLE' 
			AND		TABLE_NAME IN ('SalesContracts','InventoryOnHandBalance','PurchaseContracts')


	OPEN Cur2
	FETCH NEXT FROM Cur2 INTO @DeleteTableStatement
	WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0
		  BEGIN
				PRINT 'Executing ' + @DeleteTableStatement
				EXECUTE sp_executesql @DeleteTableStatement
				FETCH NEXT FROM Cur2 INTO @DeleteTableStatement
		  END
	CLOSE Cur2
	DEALLOCATE Cur2

/********************************************************************************************************
	Step 2.2:	Create the Trade.Yield table.
********************************************************************************************************/

	IF OBJECT_ID('[Trade].[Yield]','U') IS NOT NULL
		DROP TABLE [Trade].[Yield]

	SELECT		CASE WHEN [Business Unit] = 'BDA' THEN 'BDA BU' ELSE [Business Unit] END AS [Business Unit]
	,			[Item Category]
	,			[Expected yield]
	,			CONVERT(DATE,[Start date],103)	AS [Start date]
	,			CONVERT(DATE,[End date],103) AS [End date]
	,			[Stamp]
	INTO		[Trade].[Yield]
	FROM		[RAW].[NO.Yields]

/********************************************************************************************************
	Step 2.3:	Create the Trade.PurchaseContracts table.

				Trade.PurchaseContracts is built by joining [Core].[PurchaseContracts], [Core].[Suppliers],
				[Core].[Parties], [Core].[Organizations], [Core].[Items], [Core].[PurchaseOrders], ,
				[Core].[Users], [Core].[FXRates] and [Trade].[Yield]

				[Core].[Organizations] is filtered for [Business Unit Name] values of 'BDA BU', 'Motherwell'
				and 'Stanlow'.

				Contracts with an end date prior to July 2021 and an [Amount Released Against Agreement] value of 0
				are not brought into Trade.PurchaseContracts

	Assumptions:	1)	Chemical contracts (Item Code starts with "CH") that do not have a populated end date have
						the end date set to the end of the year of the start date.

					2)	Delivered Quantity is calculated by combining [Core].[PurchaseOrders] and [Core].[ReceivingTransactions]
						and filtering for [Destination Type Code] = 'INVENTORY', [Line Status] NOT IN ('OPEN','CANCELED','CLOSED FOR INVOICING')
						and [Transaction Type] <> 'RETURN TO RECEIVING' then summing [Primary Quantity].

					3)	Returned Quantity is calculated by combining [Core].[PurchaseOrders] and [Core].[ReceivingTransactions]
						and filtering for [Destination Type Code] = 'INVENTORY', [Line Status] NOT IN ('OPEN','CANCELED','CLOSED FOR INVOICING')
						and [Transaction Type] = 'RETURN TO RECEIVING' then summing [Primary Quantity].

					4)	Yield adjusted volumes are calculated by joining [Trade].[Yields] onto the Core tables on date and item category.
						If the item category is not found in [Trade].[Yields] then the average yield for the business unit is used.

					5)	Purchase Document Status is changed to "Closed" for contracts that have expired and have a status that is not Closed, Finally Closed or Cancelled.
					
********************************************************************************************************/



	INSERT INTO [Trade].[PurchaseContracts]
	SELECT		o.[Business Unit Name]
	,			pc.[Blanket Purchase Agreement Number] 
	,			CONCAT(LEFT(pc.[Purchase Document Status],1),LOWER(SUBSTRING(pc.[Purchase Document Status],2,LEN(pc.[Purchase Document Status])-1)))		AS [Purchase Document Status]
	,			UPPER(sn.[Supplier Name])																													AS [Supplier Name]
	,			UPPER(s.[Supplier Site Name])																												AS [Supplier Site Name]
	,			pc.[Purchase Document Description]
	,			i.[Item Code]
	,			i.[Item Name]
	,			pc.[Item Description]
	,			i.[Category Code] 
	,			pc.[Unit Price] + pc.[Transporter Unit Price] + pc.[Additional Charges 1 Unit Price] + pc.[Additional Charges 2 Unit Price]
				+ ISNULL(CASE 
							WHEN p.[Shipping Method] IN ('Argent - Truck','Argent - Container','AENL - Truck','AENL - Container','Argent - Drop Ship')
								THEN (pc.[Transporter Amount] + pc.[Additional Charges 1 Amount] + pc.[Additional Charges 2 Amount])/25
							ELSE (pc.[Transporter Amount] + pc.[Additional Charges 1 Amount] + pc.[Additional Charges 2 Amount])/CASE
																																	WHEN i.[Item Code] = 'CH00006'
																																		THEN 650
																																	ELSE NULLIF(pc.[Blanket Agreement Quantity],0)
																																END
						 END,0)																																AS [Total Price]
	,			pc.[Unit Price]
	,			pc.[Purchase Document Currency]
	,			ISNULL(pc.[Blanket Agreement Quantity],0)																									AS [Blanket Agreement Quantity]
	,			pc.[UOM Code]
	,			ISNULL(dq.[Delivered Qty],0) - ISNULL(rq.[Returned Qty],0)																					AS [Delivered Quantity]
	,			ISNULL(oq.[Ordered Qty],0)																													AS [Order Quantity]
	,			ISNULL(pc.[Blanket Agreement Quantity],0) - (ISNULL(dq.[Delivered Qty],0) - ISNULL(rq.[Returned Qty],0)) - ISNULL(oq.[Ordered Qty],0)		AS [Remaining Quantity]
	,			(ISNULL(pc.[Blanket Agreement Quantity],0) - (ISNULL(dq.[Delivered Qty],0) - ISNULL(rq.[Returned Qty],0)) - ISNULL(oq.[Ordered Qty],0))/25	AS [Trucks]
	,			((ISNULL(dq.[Delivered Qty],0) - ISNULL(rq.[Returned Qty],0)) + ISNULL(oq.[Ordered Qty],0))/NULLIF(pc.[Blanket Agreement Quantity],0)		AS [Position Now]

	--          Calculation below is [Expected Position] = 1 - ([Weeks Remaining]/[Weeknumbers Contract])
	,			1 - (CAST(CASE
								WHEN CONVERT(DATE, DATEADD(DAY, 1, GETDATE() - DATEPART(DW, GETDATE()) + CASE WHEN DATEPART(DW, GETDATE()) < 1 THEN 0 ELSE 7 END )) < CAST(pc.[Agreement Start Date] AS DATE)
									THEN	CASE
												WHEN pc.[Agreement Start Date] IS NULL OR CASE
																							WHEN LEFT(i.[Item Code],2) = 'CH' AND pc.[Agreement End Date] IS NULL AND pc.[Agreement Start Date] IS NOT NULL
																								THEN CONCAT(YEAR(pc.[Agreement Start Date]),'-12-31')
																							ELSE pc.[Agreement End Date]
																						END IS NULL
													THEN 0
												ELSE DATEDIFF(DAY,pc.[Agreement Start Date],CASE
																								WHEN LEFT(i.[Item Code],2) = 'CH' AND pc.[Agreement End Date] IS NULL AND pc.[Agreement Start Date] <> NULL
																									THEN CONCAT(YEAR(pc.[Agreement Start Date]),'-12-31')
																								ELSE pc.[Agreement End Date]
																							END)/7
											END
								WHEN CONVERT(DATE, DATEADD(DAY, 1, GETDATE() - DATEPART(DW, GETDATE()) + CASE WHEN DATEPART(DW, GETDATE()) < 1 THEN 0 ELSE 7 END )) > CAST(CASE
																																												WHEN LEFT(i.[Item Code],2) = 'CH' AND pc.[Agreement End Date] IS NULL AND pc.[Agreement Start Date] IS NOT NULL
																																													THEN CONCAT(YEAR(pc.[Agreement Start Date]),'-12-31')
																																												ELSE pc.[Agreement End Date]
																																											END AS DATE)
									THEN 0
								ELSE DATEDIFF(DAY,CONVERT(DATE, DATEADD(DAY, 1, GETDATE() - DATEPART(DW, GETDATE()) + CASE WHEN DATEPART(DW, GETDATE()) < 1 THEN 0 ELSE 7 END )),CAST(CASE
																																															WHEN LEFT(i.[Item Code],2) = 'CH' AND pc.[Agreement End Date] IS NULL AND pc.[Agreement Start Date] IS NOT NULL
																																																THEN CONCAT(YEAR(pc.[Agreement Start Date]),'-12-31')
																																															ELSE pc.[Agreement End Date]
																																														END AS DATE))/7
						  END AS DECIMAL(28,2))					
					/CAST(NULLIF(CASE
									WHEN pc.[Agreement Start Date] IS NULL OR CASE
																				WHEN LEFT(i.[Item Code],2) = 'CH' AND pc.[Agreement End Date] IS NULL AND pc.[Agreement Start Date] IS NOT NULL
																					THEN CONCAT(YEAR(pc.[Agreement Start Date]),'-12-31')
																				ELSE pc.[Agreement End Date]
																			END IS NULL
										THEN 0
									ELSE DATEDIFF(DAY,pc.[Agreement Start Date],CASE
																					WHEN LEFT(i.[Item Code],2) = 'CH' AND pc.[Agreement End Date] IS NULL AND pc.[Agreement Start Date] IS NOT NULL
																						THEN CONCAT(YEAR(pc.[Agreement Start Date]),'-12-31')
																					ELSE pc.[Agreement End Date]
																				END)/7
								END,0) AS DECIMAL(28,2)))																								AS [Expected Position]

	-- [Weeknumbers Contract] is calculated below as difference between [Agreement Start Date] and [Agreement End Date]

	,			CASE
					WHEN pc.[Agreement Start Date] IS NULL OR CASE
																WHEN LEFT(i.[Item Code],2) = 'CH' AND pc.[Agreement End Date] IS NULL AND pc.[Agreement Start Date] IS NOT NULL
																	THEN CONCAT(YEAR(pc.[Agreement Start Date]),'-12-31')
																ELSE pc.[Agreement End Date]
															END IS NULL
						THEN 0
					ELSE DATEDIFF(DAY,pc.[Agreement Start Date],CASE
																	WHEN LEFT(i.[Item Code],2) = 'CH' AND pc.[Agreement End Date] IS NULL AND pc.[Agreement Start Date] IS NOT NULL
																		THEN CONCAT(YEAR(pc.[Agreement Start Date]),'-12-31')
																	ELSE pc.[Agreement End Date]
																END)/7
				END																																		AS [Weeknumbers Contract]

	-- [Weeks Remaining] is calculated below as		- Difference between [Agreement Start Date and [Agreement End Date] if GETDATE() < [Agreement Start Date]
	--												- 0 if GETDATE() > [Agreement End Date]
	--												- ELSE difference between [Next Monday] and [Agreement End Date]


	,			CASE
					WHEN CONVERT(DATE, DATEADD(DAY, 1, GETDATE() - DATEPART(DW, GETDATE()) + CASE WHEN DATEPART(DW, GETDATE()) < 1 THEN 0 ELSE 7 END )) < CAST(pc.[Agreement Start Date] AS DATE)
						 THEN	CASE
									WHEN pc.[Agreement Start Date] = '' OR CASE
																				WHEN LEFT(i.[Item Code],2) = 'CH' AND pc.[Agreement End Date] IS NULL AND pc.[Agreement Start Date] IS NOT NULL
																					THEN CONCAT(YEAR(pc.[Agreement Start Date]),'-12-31')
																				ELSE pc.[Agreement End Date]
																			END IS NULL
										THEN 0
									ELSE DATEDIFF(DAY,pc.[Agreement Start Date],CASE
																					WHEN LEFT(i.[Item Code],2) = 'CH' AND pc.[Agreement End Date] IS NULL AND pc.[Agreement Start Date] IS NOT NULL
																						THEN CONCAT(YEAR(pc.[Agreement Start Date]),'-12-31')
																					ELSE pc.[Agreement End Date]
																				END)/7
								END
					WHEN CONVERT(DATE, DATEADD(DAY, 1, GETDATE() - DATEPART(DW, GETDATE()) + CASE WHEN DATEPART(DW, GETDATE()) < 1 THEN 0 ELSE 7 END )) > CAST(CASE
																																									WHEN LEFT(i.[Item Code],2) = 'CH' AND pc.[Agreement End Date] IS NULL AND pc.[Agreement Start Date] IS NOT NULL
																																										THEN CONCAT(YEAR(pc.[Agreement Start Date]),'-12-31')
																																									ELSE pc.[Agreement End Date]
																																								END AS DATE)
						 THEN 0
					ELSE DATEDIFF(DAY,CONVERT(DATE, DATEADD(DAY, 1, GETDATE() - DATEPART(DW, GETDATE()) + CASE WHEN DATEPART(DW, GETDATE()) < 1 THEN 0 ELSE 7 END )),CAST(CASE
																																												WHEN LEFT(i.[Item Code],2) = 'CH' AND pc.[Agreement End Date] IS NULL AND pc.[Agreement Start Date] IS NOT NULL
																																													THEN CONCAT(YEAR(pc.[Agreement Start Date]),'-12-31')
																																												ELSE pc.[Agreement End Date]
																																											END AS DATE))/7
				END																																		AS [Weeks Remaining]

	,			CONVERT(DATE, DATEADD(DAY, 1, GETDATE() - DATEPART(DW, GETDATE()) + CASE WHEN DATEPART(DW, GETDATE()) < 1 THEN 0 ELSE 7 END ))			AS [Next Monday]
	,			pc.[Agreement Start Date]
	,			CASE
					WHEN LEFT(i.[Item Code],2) = 'CH' AND pc.[Agreement End Date] IS NULL AND pc.[Agreement Start Date] IS NOT NULL
						THEN CONCAT(YEAR(pc.[Agreement Start Date]),'-12-31')
					ELSE pc.[Agreement End Date]
				END																																		AS [Agreement End Date]
	,			p.[Shipping Method]
	,			pc.[Incoterm]
	,			pc.[Transporter Name]
	,			pc.[Transporter Unit Price]
	,			pc.[Transporter Amount]
	,			pc.[Transporter Currency]
	,			pc.[Additional Charges 1 Supplier]	
	,			pc.[Additional Charges 1 Unit Price]
	,			pc.[Additional Charges 1 Amount]
	,			pc.[Additional Charges 1 Currency]
	,			pc.[Additional Charges 2 Supplier]	
	,			pc.[Additional Charges 2 Unit Price]
	,			pc.[Additional Charges 2 Amount]
	,			pc.[Additional Charges 2 Currency]
	,			u.[Username]																															AS [Buyer]
	,			pc.[Sustainability Position]
	,			pc.[Supplier Item]
	,			pc.[Deal Date]
	,			pc.[Agreement Amount]
	,			pc.[Amount Released Against Agreement]
	,			pc.[Note To Vendor]
	,			pc.[FFA Spec]			
	,			pc.[Line Status]
	,			fx.[EUR USD]
	,			fx.[EUR GBP]
	,			CASE
					WHEN CASE	WHEN LEFT(i.[Item Code],2) = 'CH' AND pc.[Agreement End Date] IS NULL AND pc.[Agreement Start Date] IS NOT NULL THEN CONCAT(YEAR(pc.[Agreement Start Date]),'-12-31') ELSE pc.[Agreement End Date]  END IS NULL


					THEN CONCAT(LEFT(pc.[Purchase Document Status],1),LOWER(SUBSTRING(pc.[Purchase Document Status],2,LEN(pc.[Purchase Document Status])-1)))
					
					WHEN pc.[Purchase Document Status] not in ('closed' ,'finally closed', 'canceled') AND CAST(CASE WHEN LEFT(i.[Item Code],2) = 'CH' AND pc.[Agreement End Date] IS NULL AND pc.[Agreement Start Date] IS NOT NULL THEN CONCAT(YEAR(pc.[Agreement Start Date]),'-12-31') ELSE pc.[Agreement End Date] END AS DATE) < GETDATE()
						THEN 'Closed'
					ELSE CONCAT(LEFT(pc.[Purchase Document Status],1),LOWER(SUBSTRING(pc.[Purchase Document Status],2,LEN(pc.[Purchase Document Status])-1)))
				END																																				AS [Updated Contract Status]
	,			CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE)																															AS [DateStamp]
	,			ISNULL(pc.[Blanket Agreement Quantity],0) * ISNULL(ISNULL(y.[Expected yield],av.[Average Yield]),av2.[Average Yield])							AS [Yield Adjusted Volume]
	,			CAST(ISNULL(ISNULL(DATEADD(d,DATEDIFF(d,pc.[Agreement Start Date],CASE
																			 	  WHEN LEFT(i.[Item Code],2) = 'CH' AND pc.[Agreement End Date] IS NULL AND pc.[Agreement Start Date] IS NOT NULL
																			 		THEN CONCAT(YEAR(pc.[Agreement Start Date]),'-12-31')
																			 	  ELSE pc.[Agreement End Date]
																			 END)/2,pc.[Agreement Start Date]),pc.[Agreement Start Date]),CASE
																																		  	  WHEN LEFT(i.[Item Code],2) = 'CH' AND pc.[Agreement End Date] IS NULL AND pc.[Agreement Start Date] IS NOT NULL
																																		  		THEN CONCAT(YEAR(pc.[Agreement Start Date]),'-12-31')
																																		  	  ELSE pc.[Agreement End Date]
																																		  END) AS DATE)			AS [Agreement Mid Date]	
	,			ISNULL(pc.[Blanket Agreement Quantity],0) - (ISNULL(dq.[Delivered Qty],0) - ISNULL(rq.[Returned Qty],0))										AS [Non-Delivered Quantity]
	,			(ISNULL(pc.[Blanket Agreement Quantity],0) - (ISNULL(dq.[Delivered Qty],0) - ISNULL(rq.[Returned Qty],0)))
					* ISNULL(ISNULL(y.[Expected yield],av.[Average Yield]),av2.[Average Yield])																	AS [Yield Adjusted Volume Non-Delivered]
	FROM		[Core].[PurchaseContracts] pc
	LEFT JOIN	[Core].[Suppliers] s
	ON			pc.[Supplier] = s.[Vendor ID]
	AND			pc.[Vendor Site ID] = s.[Vendor Site ID]
	LEFT JOIN	(
					SELECT		[Party ID] 
					,			MIN([Party Name])	AS [Supplier Name]
					FROM		[Core].[Parties]
					GROUP BY	[Party ID]
				) sn
	ON			s.[Party ID] = sn.[Party ID]
	LEFT JOIN	(
					SELECT		[Business Unit ID]
					,			[Business Unit Name]
					FROM		[Core].[Organizations]
					GROUP BY	[Business Unit ID]
					,			[Business Unit Name]
				) o
	ON			pc.[Purchasing BU] = o.[Business Unit ID]
	LEFT JOIN	(
					SELECT		[Item Code]
					,			[Inventory Item ID]
					,			[Category Code]
					,			MIN([Item Name])	AS [Item Name]
					FROM		[Core].[Items]
					GROUP BY	[Item Code]
					,			[Inventory Item ID]
					,			[Category Code]
				) i 
	ON			i.[Inventory Item ID] = pc.[Item ID]
	LEFT JOIN	(
					SELECT		[Party ID]
					,			MIN([Party Name])	AS [Shipping Method]
					FROM		[Core].[Parties]
					GROUP BY	[Party ID]
				) p
	ON			pc.[Carrier ID] = p.[Party ID]
	LEFT JOIN	(
					SELECT		[From Header ID]
					,			SUM(ISNULL(CAST(CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(rt.[Primary Quantity])) IS NULL THEN '0' ELSE LTRIM(RTRIM(rt.[Primary Quantity])) END AS NUMERIC(28,8)),0)) AS [Delivered Qty]
					FROM		[Core].[PurchaseOrders] po
					LEFT JOIN	[Core].[ReceivingTransactions] rt
					ON			rt.[PO Line ID] = po.[PO Line ID]
					WHERE		rt.[Destination Type Code] = 'INVENTORY'
					AND			po.[Line Status] NOT IN ('OPEN','CANCELED','CLOSED FOR INVOICING')
					AND			rt.[Transaction Type] <> 'RETURN TO RECEIVING'
					GROUP BY	[From Header ID]
				) dq
	ON			dq.[From Header ID] = pc.[PO Header ID]
	LEFT JOIN	(
					SELECT		[From Header ID]
					,			SUM(ISNULL(CAST(CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(rt.[Primary Quantity])) IS NULL THEN '0' ELSE LTRIM(RTRIM(rt.[Primary Quantity])) END AS NUMERIC(28,8)),0)) AS [Returned Qty]
					FROM		[Core].[PurchaseOrders] po
					LEFT JOIN	[Core].[ReceivingTransactions] rt
					ON			rt.[PO Line ID] = po.[PO Line ID]
					WHERE		rt.[Destination Type Code] = 'INVENTORY'
					AND			po.[Line Status] NOT IN ('OPEN','CANCELED','CLOSED FOR INVOICING')
					AND			rt.[Transaction Type] = 'RETURN TO RECEIVING'
					GROUP BY	[From Header ID]
				) rq
	ON			rq.[From Header ID] = pc.[PO Header ID]
	LEFT JOIN	(
					SELECT		[From Header ID]
					,			SUM(ISNULL(CAST(CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM([Ordered Quantity])) IS NULL THEN '0' ELSE LTRIM(RTRIM([Ordered Quantity])) END AS NUMERIC(28,8)),0)) AS [Ordered Qty]
					FROM		[Core].[PurchaseOrders]
					WHERE		[Line Status] IN ('OPEN','CLOSED FOR INVOICING')
					GROUP BY	[From Header ID]
				) oq
	ON			oq.[From Header ID] = pc.[PO Header ID]
	LEFT JOIN	[Core].[Users] u
	ON			pc.[Buyer] = u.[Person ID]
	LEFT JOIN	[Core].[FXRates] fx
	ON			CAST(pc.[Agreement Start Date] AS DATE) = CAST(fx.[CONVERSION_DATE] AS DATE)
	LEFT JOIN	[Trade].[Yield] y
	ON			o.[Business Unit Name] = y.[Business Unit]
	AND			CASE WHEN i.[Category Code] = 'Feedstock.TallowABP' THEN 'Feedstock.Tallow' ELSE i.[Category Code] END = y.[Item Category]
	AND			(CASE WHEN YEAR(CAST(pc.[Agreement Start Date] AS DATE)) < 2020 THEN CAST('2020-01-01' AS DATE)
					 ELSE CAST(pc.[Agreement Start Date] AS DATE)
				END BETWEEN y.[Start Date] AND y.[End date] OR (pc.[Agreement Start Date] > y.[Start Date] AND y.[End date] IS NULL))
	LEFT JOIN	(
						SELECT		DISTINCT [Business Unit]
						,			[Start date]
						,			[End date]
						,			AVG(CAST([Expected yield] AS DECIMAL(28,8)))OVER(PARTITION BY [Business Unit], [Start date]) AS [Average Yield]
						FROM		[Trade].[Yield]	
				) av
	ON			o.[Business Unit Name] = av.[Business Unit]
	AND			CASE WHEN YEAR(CAST(pc.[Agreement Start Date] AS DATE)) < 2020 THEN CAST('2020-01-01' AS DATE)
					 ELSE CAST(pc.[Agreement Start Date] AS DATE)
				END BETWEEN av.[Start Date] AND ISNULL(av.[End date],CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE))
	LEFT JOIN	(
						SELECT		DISTINCT [Business Unit]
						,			[Start date]
						,			[End date]
						,			AVG(CAST([Expected yield] AS DECIMAL(28,8)))OVER(PARTITION BY [Business Unit], [Start date]) AS [Average Yield]
						FROM		[Trade].[Yield]	
						WHERE		CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE) BETWEEN [Start Date] AND ISNULL([End date],CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE))
				) av2
	ON			o.[Business Unit Name] = av2.[Business Unit]
	WHERE		o.[Business Unit Name] IN ('BDA BU','Motherwell','Stanlow')
	AND			pc.[Blanket Purchase Agreement Number] NOT IN (
																	SELECT		DISTINCT [Blanket Purchase Agreement Number]
																	FROM		[Core].[PurchaseContracts]
																	WHERE		[Amount Released Against Agreement] = 0
																	AND			[Agreement End Date] < '2021-07-01'
															   ) 	








/********************************************************************************************************
	Step 2.4:	Create the Trade.SalesContracts table.

				Trade.SalesContracts is built by joining [Core].[Parties], [Core].[Organizations], [Core].[Items]
				, [Core].[SalesContracts], [Core].[SalesOrders_Fulfilled] and [Core].[FXRates]

				[Core].[SalesContracts] is filtered for [Version Type] equals C.

				[Core].[Organizations] is filtered for [Business Unit Name] values of 'BDA BU', 'Motherwell and 'Stanlow

	Assumptions:	1)	Shipped and Order Quantities are calculated by combining [Core].[SalesContracts] and [Core].[SalesOrders_Fulfilled]
						then filtering for [Version Type] = 'C', [ORDERED_UOM] = 'TN' and [REFERENCE_FLINE_ID] IS NULL.

					2)	Purchase Document Status is changed to "Closed" for contracts that have expired and have a status that is not Closed, Finally Closed, Cancelled or Expired.
					
********************************************************************************************************/
 



	INSERT INTO [Trade].[SalesContracts]
	SELECT		o.[Business Unit Name]
	,			sc.[Sales Contract Number]
	,			sc.[Sales Contract Version]
	,			REPLACE(CONCAT(LEFT(sc.[Sales Contract Status],1),LOWER(SUBSTRING(sc.[Sales Contract Status],2,LEN(sc.[Sales Contract Status])-1))),'_',' ')	AS [Sales Contract Status]
	,			UPPER(c.[Customer])																																AS [Customer]
	,			c.[Customer Number]
	,			UPPER(sc.[Customer Bill To])																													AS [Customer Bill To]
	,			UPPER(sc.[Customer Ship To])																													AS [Customer Ship To]
	,			sc.[Description]
	,			sc.[Additional Description]
	,			sc.[Item Name]
	,			i.[Item Name]	AS [Item Description]
	,			i.[Category Code]
	,			CAST(CASE WHEN sc.[Agreement Price] IS NULL THEN '0' ELSE sc.[Agreement Price] END AS NUMERIC(28,8)) 
				- CAST(CASE WHEN sc.[Transporter Unit Price] IS NULL THEN '0' ELSE sc.[Transporter Unit Price] END AS NUMERIC(28,2))
				- CAST(CASE WHEN sc.[Additional Charges 1 Unit Price] IS NULL THEN '0' ELSE sc.[Additional Charges 1 Unit Price] END AS NUMERIC(28,2))
				- CAST(CASE WHEN sc.[Additional Charges 2 Unit Price] IS NULL THEN '0' ELSE sc.[Additional Charges 2 Unit Price] END AS NUMERIC(28,2))		AS [Total Price per tonne]
	,			(CAST(CASE WHEN sc.[Transporter Amount] IS NULL THEN '0' ELSE sc.[Transporter Amount] END AS NUMERIC(28,2))
				+ CAST(CASE WHEN sc.[Additional Charges 1 Amount] IS NULL THEN '0' ELSE sc.[Additional Charges 1 Amount] END AS NUMERIC(28,2))
				+ CAST(CASE WHEN sc.[Additional Charges 2 Amount] IS NULL THEN '0' ELSE sc.[Additional Charges 2 Amount] END AS NUMERIC(28,2))) * (-1)		AS [Add. Cost per Transport]
	,			sc.[Currency Code]
	,			CASE
					WHEN sc.[Line Quantity] IS NULL
						THEN CAST(CASE WHEN sc.[Line Amount] IS NULL THEN '0' ELSE sc.[Line Amount] END AS NUMERIC(28,2))/NULLIF(CAST(CASE WHEN sc.[Agreement Price] IS NULL THEN '0' ELSE sc.[Agreement Price] END AS NUMERIC(28,2)),0)
					ELSE CAST(sc.[Line Quantity] AS NUMERIC(28,2))
				END																																			AS [Line Quantity]
	,			sc.[UOM Code]
	,			sc.[Line Start Date]
	,			sc.[Line End Date]
	,			sc.[Shipping Method]
	,			sc.[Incoterm]
	,			o.[Business Unit Name]								AS [Seller]
	,			ISNULL(q.[Order Quantity],0)						AS [Order Quantity]	
	,			ISNULL(q.[Shipped Quantity],0)						AS [Shipped Quantity]
	,			sc.[Line Amount]
	,			sc.[Agreement Price]
	,			sc.[Transporter]
	,			sc.[Transporter Unit Price]
	,			sc.[Transporter Amount]
	,			sc.[Transporter Currency]
	,			sc.[Additional Charges 1 Supplier]
	,			sc.[Additional Charges 1 Description]
	,			sc.[Additional Charges 1 Unit Price]
	,			sc.[Additional Charges 1 Amount]
	,			sc.[Additional Charges 1 Currency]
	,			sc.[Additional Charges 2 Supplier]
	,			sc.[Additional Charges 2 Description]
	,			sc.[Additional Charges 2 Unit Price]
	,			sc.[Additional Charges 2 Amount]
	,			sc.[Additional Charges 2 Currency]
	,			sc.[Trader]
	,			sc.[Deal Date]
	,			sc.[Payment Term]
	,			sc.[Tolerance]
	,			sc.[Laycan]
	,			sc.[Sustainability Contact]
	,			sc.[Sustainability Position]
	,			sc.[Sustainability Position Details]
	,			sc.[Quality]
	,			sc.[Temperature]
	,			sc.[Nomination]
	,			sc.[Nomination Requirement]	
	,			sc.[Lay Time]
	,			sc.[Inspection]
	,			sc.[Detenation Demurrage]
	,			sc.[Demurrage Vessel]
	,			sc.[Legislation]
	,			sc.[Disposal Method]
	,			sc.[Waste Stream Number]
	,			sc.[Waste Description]
	,			sc.[VET ID]
	,			fx.[EUR USD]
	,			fx.[EUR GBP]
	,			CASE
					WHEN sc.[Sales Contract Status] not in ('Closed', 'Caneled','Finally closed', 'expired') AND ISDATE([Line End Date]) = 1 AND CAST([Line End Date] AS DATE) < GETDATE()
						THEN 'Closed'
					ELSE sc.[Sales Contract Status]
				END																																		AS [Updated Contract Status]
	,			CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE)																													AS [DateStamp]
	,			CASE
					WHEN sc.[Line Quantity] IS NULL
						THEN CAST(CASE WHEN sc.[Line Amount] IS NULL THEN '0' ELSE sc.[Line Amount] END AS NUMERIC(28,2))/NULLIF(CAST(CASE WHEN sc.[Agreement Price] IS NULL THEN '0' ELSE sc.[Agreement Price] END AS NUMERIC(28,2)),0)
					ELSE CAST(sc.[Line Quantity] AS NUMERIC(28,2))
				END - ISNULL(q.[Shipped Quantity],0)				AS [Volume Non-Delivered]
	,			CAST(ISNULL(ISNULL(DATEADD(d,DATEDIFF(d,sc.[Line Start Date],sc.[Line End Date])/2,sc.[Line Start Date]),sc.[Line Start Date]),sc.[Line End Date]) AS DATE) AS [Line Mid Date]
	FROM		[Core].[SalesContracts] sc
	LEFT JOIN	(
					SELECT		[Party ID]
					,			[Party Number]		AS [Customer Number]
					,			MIN([Party Name])	AS [Customer]
					FROM		[Core].[Parties]
					GROUP BY	[Party ID]
					,			[Party Number]
				) c
	ON			sc.[Sales Contract Customer] = c.[Party ID]
	LEFT JOIN	(
					SELECT		[Business Unit ID]
					,			[Business Unit Name]
					FROM		[Core].[Organizations]
					GROUP BY	[Business Unit ID]
					,			[Business Unit Name]
				) o
	ON			sc.[Business Unit] = o.[Business Unit ID]
	LEFT JOIN	(
					SELECT		[Item Code]
					,			[Item Name]
					,			[Category Code]
					FROM		[Core].[Items] 
					WHERE		[Organization ID] = '300000001513519' --Master Stock List
					GROUP BY	[Item Code]
					,			[Item Name]
					,			[Category Code]
				) i
	ON			i.[Item Code] = sc.[Item Name]
	LEFT JOIN	(
					SELECT		sc.[Contract Header ID]
					,			sc.[Line ID]
					,			SUM(CAST(sof.[FULFILLED_QTY] AS NUMERIC(28,2)) - 2*CAST(sof.[RMA_DELIVERED_QTY] AS NUMERIC(28,2)))	AS [Shipped Quantity]
					,			SUM(CAST(sof.[ORDERED_QTY] AS NUMERIC(28,2)) - CAST(sof.[FULFILLED_QTY] AS NUMERIC(28,2)))			AS [Order Quantity]
					FROM		[Core].[SalesContracts] sc
					LEFT JOIN	[Core].[SalesOrders_Fulfilled] sof
					ON			sc.[Contract Header ID] = sof.[AGREEMENT_HEADER_ID]
					AND			sc.[Line ID] = sof.[AGREEMENT_LINE_ID]
					WHERE		sc.[Version Type] = 'C'
					AND			sof.[ORDERED_UOM] = 'TN'
					AND			sof.[REFERENCE_FLINE_ID] IS NULL
					GROUP BY	sc.[Contract Header ID]
					,			sc.[Line ID]
				) q	
	ON			sc.[Contract Header ID] = q.[Contract Header ID]
	AND			sc.[Line ID] = q.[Line ID]
	LEFT JOIN	[Core].[FXRates] fx
	ON			CAST(sc.[Line Start Date] AS DATE) = CAST(fx.[CONVERSION_DATE] AS DATE)
	WHERE		[Version Type] = 'C'
	AND			o.[Business Unit Name] IN ('Motherwell','Stanlow','BDA BU')










/********************************************************************************************************
	Step 2.5:	Create the Trade.InventoryOnHandBalances table.

				Trade.InventoryOnHandBalance is built by joining [Core].[OnHandBalance] and [Trade].[Yield]

				[Business Unit Name] is filtered for Motherwell, Stanlow and BDA BU.

	Assumptions:	1)	If the Transaction UOM Code = 'LTR' or 'MLT' then the [Primary Transaction Quantity] is multiplied 
						by 0.0008745 to convert to metric tonnes.

					2)	Yield adjusted volumes are calculated by joining [Trade].[Yields] onto the Core tables on date and item category.
						If the item category is not found in [Trade].[Yields] then the average yield for the business unit is used.
********************************************************************************************************/




	INSERT INTO [Trade].[InventoryOnHandBalance]
	SELECT		ohb.[Inventory Organization Name]								AS [Inventory Organization Name]		
	,			ohb.[Item ID]													AS [Item ID]							
	,			ohb.[Inventory Organization ID]									AS [Inventory Organization ID]			
	,			ohb.[Primary Transaction Quantity]								AS [Primary Transaction Quantity]		
	,			ohb.[Subinventory]												AS [Subinventory]						
	,			ohb.[Onhand Quantities ID]										AS [Onhand Quantities ID]				
	,			ohb.[Transaction UOM Code]										AS [Transaction UOM Code]				
	,			ohb.[Lot Number]												AS [Lot Number]						
	,			ohb.[Item Code]													AS [Item Code]							
	,			ohb.[Item Name]													AS [Item Name]							
	,			ohb.[Category Set Name]											AS [Category Set Name]					
	,			ohb.[Category Code]												AS [Category Code]						
	,			ohb.[Category Set Description]									AS [Category Set Description]			
	,			CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE)											AS [DateStamp]
	,			CASE
					WHEN ohb.[Transaction UOM Code] IN ('LTR', 'MLT', 'SLT')
						THEN ohb.[Primary Transaction Quantity] * 0.0008745
					ELSE ohb.[Primary Transaction Quantity]
				END																AS [Primary Transaction Quantity MT]
	,			ohb.[Business Unit Name]										AS [Business Unit Name]
	,			CASE
					WHEN ohb.[Transaction UOM Code] IN ('LTR', 'MLT', 'SLT')
						THEN ohb.[Primary Transaction Quantity] * 0.0008745
					ELSE ohb.[Primary Transaction Quantity]
				END * ISNULL(y.[Expected yield],av.[Average Yield])				AS [Yield Adjusted Volume]
	FROM		[Core].[OnHandBalance] ohb
	LEFT JOIN	[Trade].[Yield] y
	ON			ohb.[Business Unit Name] = y.[Business Unit]
	AND			CASE WHEN ohb.[Category Code] = 'Feedstock.TallowABP' THEN 'Feedstock.Tallow' ELSE ohb.[Category Code] END = y.[Item Category]
	AND			CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE) BETWEEN CONVERT(DATE,y.[Start Date],103) AND ISNULL(CONVERT(DATE,y.[End date],103),CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE))
	LEFT JOIN	(
						SELECT		DISTINCT [Business Unit]
						,			CONVERT(DATE,[Start date],103) AS [Start date]
						,			CONVERT(DATE,[End date],103) AS [End date]
						,			AVG(CAST([Expected yield] AS DECIMAL(28,8)))OVER(PARTITION BY [Business Unit], [Start date]) AS [Average Yield]
						FROM		[Trade].[Yield]	
				) av
	ON			ohb.[Business Unit Name] = av.[Business Unit]
	AND			CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE) BETWEEN av.[Start Date] AND ISNULL(av.[End date],CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE))
	WHERE		[Business Unit Name] IN ('Motherwell','Stanlow','BDA BU')









/********************************************************************************************************
	Step 2.6:	Create the Trade.BlendedSales table.
********************************************************************************************************/

	IF OBJECT_ID('[Trade].[BlendedSales]','U') IS NOT NULL
		DROP TABLE [Trade].[BlendedSales]

	SELECT		'Stanlow' AS [Business Unit Name]
	,			[Customer]
	,			[Period]
	,			CAST([Volume (MT)] AS NUMERIC(28,2))									AS [Volume (MT)]
	,			CASE
					WHEN [Period] LIKE '%Sept%' OR [Period] LIKE '%April%' OR [Period] LIKE '%June%' OR [Period] LIKE '%Nov%'
						THEN CAST([Volume (MT)] AS NUMERIC(28,2))/30
					WHEN [Period] LIKE '%Feb%'
						THEN CAST([Volume (MT)] AS NUMERIC(28,2))/CASE
																	  WHEN CAST(CAST(LEFT([Period],4) AS NUMERIC(28,2))/4 AS VARCHAR(50)) LIKE '%.00%' 
																		  THEN 29
																      ELSE 28
															      END 
				   ELSE CAST([Volume (MT)] AS NUMERIC(28,2))/31
				END																AS [Volume per Day]
	,			CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE)											AS [Upload Date]
	INTO		[Trade].[BlendedSales]
	FROM		[RAW].[NO.BlendedSales]



/********************************************************************************************************
	Step 2.7:	Create the Trade.ExposureLimits table.
********************************************************************************************************/

	IF OBJECT_ID('[Trade].[ExposureLimits]','U') IS NOT NULL
		DROP TABLE [Trade].[ExposureLimits]

	SELECT		*
	INTO		[Trade].[ExposureLimits]
	FROM		(
					SELECT		*
					,			ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY [Start date] ORDER BY [Start date] DESC) AS [Latest Values]
					FROM		[RAW].[NO.ExposureLimits]
				) el
	WHERE		[Latest Values] = 1

/*==================================================================================================================*
 * Project:		Argent																								*
 * Purpose:		Drop RAW tables																						*
 * Description:	Drop the RAW tables used to create the Core tables.													*
 * Date:        29/07/2022																							*
 * Version:     1.0																									*																			
 *==================================================================================================================*
 * Updates:																											*
 * Date		| Version | Author		| Change made																	*
 * -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*
 * --/--/-- |  1.-	  |				|																				*
 *			|		  |				|																				*
 *==================================================================================================================*/
 

/********************************************************************************************************
	Step 1.1:	Drop tables
********************************************************************************************************/

	DECLARE @DropTableStatement NVARCHAR(MAX)
	DECLARE Cur2 CURSOR READ_ONLY
	FOR
			SELECT  'DROP TABLE [RAW].[' + TABLE_NAME + ']'
			FROM    INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES
			WHERE   TABLE_SCHEMA = 'RAW'
			AND		TABLE_TYPE = 'BASE TABLE' 
			AND		(TABLE_NAME LIKE 'O.%' AND TABLE_NAME NOT LIKE 'O.GL%' AND TABLE_NAME NOT LIKE 'O.AP_%' AND TABLE_NAME NOT LIKE 'O.RA_CUST%' 
			        AND TABLE_NAME NOT LIKE 'O.FND%' AND TABLE_NAME NOT LIKE 'O.XLA%' AND TABLE_NAME NOT LIKE '%DISTRIBUTION%' AND TABLE_NAME NOT LIKE '%HZ_CUST%' 
					AND TABLE_NAME NOT LIKE '%RCV%' AND TABLE_NAME NOT LIKE '%CST_%' AND TABLE_NAME NOT LIKE '%WSH_%' AND TABLE_NAME NOT LIKE '%DOCUMENT_REFERENCES%'
					AND TABLE_NAME NOT LIKE 'O.DOO%' AND TABLE_NAME NOT LIKE 'O.INV%')


	OPEN Cur2
	FETCH NEXT FROM Cur2 INTO @DropTableStatement
	WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0
		  BEGIN
				PRINT 'Executing ' + @DropTableStatement
				EXECUTE sp_executesql @DropTableStatement
				FETCH NEXT FROM Cur2 INTO @DropTableStatement
		  END
	CLOSE Cur2
	DEALLOCATE Cur2

/*==================================================================================================================*
 * Project:     Argent                                                                                              *
 * Purpose:     Drop RAW tables                                                                                     *
 * Description: Drop previously imported GL tables to prevent duplications in PK columns.                            *
 * Date:        22/08/2022                                                                                          *
 * Version:     1.0                                                                                                 *                                                                          
 *==================================================================================================================*

 * Updates:                                                                                                         *

 * Date     | Version | Author      | Change made                                                                   *

 * -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*

 * --/--/-- |  1.-    |             |                                                                               *

 *          |         |             |                                                                               *

 *==================================================================================================================*/

/********************************************************************************************************
    Step 1.1:   Drop tables
********************************************************************************************************/


    DECLARE @DropTableStatement NVARCHAR(MAX)

    DECLARE Cur2 CURSOR READ_ONLY

    FOR

            SELECT  'DROP TABLE [RAW].[' + TABLE_NAME + ']'

            FROM    INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES

            WHERE   TABLE_SCHEMA = 'RAW'

            AND     TABLE_TYPE = 'BASE TABLE'

           AND    ( TABLE_NAME LIKE 'O.GL%' or TABLE_NAME LIKE 'O.AP_%' or TABLE_NAME  LIKE 'O.RA_CUST%' or TABLE_NAME  LIKE 'O.FND%' or TABLE_NAME  LIKE 'O.XLA%' or TABLE_NAME LIKE '%DISTRIBUTION%' or TABLE_NAME LIKE '%HZ_CUST%'or TABLE_NAME LIKE '%RCV%' or TABLE_NAME LIKE '%CST_%' OR TABLE_NAME LIKE '%WSH_%' OR TABLE_NAME LIKE '%DOCUMENT_REFERENCES%'
                        OR TABLE_NAME LIKE 'O.DOO%' OR TABLE_NAME LIKE 'O.INV%')


    OPEN Cur2
    FETCH NEXT FROM Cur2 INTO @DropTableStatement
    WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0
          BEGIN
                PRINT 'Executing ' + @DropTableStatement
                EXECUTE sp_executesql @DropTableStatement
                FETCH NEXT FROM Cur2 INTO @DropTableStatement
          END
    CLOSE Cur2
    DEALLOCATE Cur2

INSERT INTO [SupplyChain].[InventoryOnHandBalance]
	SELECT		ohb.[Business Unit Name]										AS [Business Unit Name]
	,			ohb.[Inventory Organization Name]								AS [Inventory Organization Name]		
	,			ohb.[Item ID]													AS [Item ID]							
	,			ohb.[Inventory Organization ID]									AS [Inventory Organization ID]			
	,			ohb.[Primary Transaction Quantity]								AS [Primary Transaction Quantity]	
	,			CASE
					WHEN ohb.[Transaction UOM Code] IN ('LTR', 'MLT', 'SLT')
						THEN ohb.[Primary Transaction Quantity] * 0.0008745
					ELSE ohb.[Primary Transaction Quantity]
				END																AS [Primary Transaction Quantity MT]	
	,			ohb.[Subinventory]												AS [Subinventory]						
	,			ohb.[Onhand Quantities ID]										AS [Onhand Quantities ID]				
	,			ohb.[Transaction UOM Code]										AS [Transaction UOM Code]				
	,			ohb.[Lot Number]												AS [Lot Number]						
	,			ohb.[Item Code]													AS [Item Code]							
	,			ohb.[Item Name]													AS [Item Name]							
	,			ohb.[Category Set Name]											AS [Category Set Name]					
	,			ohb.[Category Code]												AS [Category Code]						
	,			ohb.[Category Set Description]									AS [Category Set Description]			
	,			CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE)											AS [DateStamp]
	FROM		[Core].[OnHandBalance] ohb
	WHERE		[Business Unit Name] NOT IN ('ROTIE BU','Quatra BU')

/*==============================================================================================================================*
 * Project:		Argent																											*
 * Purpose:		Create core tables that feed in to Margin data marts.															*
 * Description:	1) Creates sales orders, invoices and inventory tables 															*																							
*																																*
 * Prerequisites: Run pipelinie in Azure DWH.			 																		*
 *																																*
 * Outputs: Tables "Core.SalesOrders", "Core.APInvoices", "Core.ARInvoices", "Core.InventoryTransactions"						*
 *			"Core.ShippingDetails", "Core.InventoryLotNumbers", "Core.InventoryLotNumberTransactions"							*
 *																																*
 *																																*
 * Date:       29/07/2022																										*
 * Version:     1.0																												*		
 *																																*
 * SQL ATR - Basic joins																										* 
 *																																*
 *==============================================================================================================================*
 * Updates:																														*
 * Date		| Version | Author		| Change made																				*
 * -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*
 * --/--/-- |  1.-	  |				|																							*
 *			|		  |				|																							*
 *==============================================================================================================================*/

/********************************************************************************************************
	Step 1.1	Create core Sales Orders table.
********************************************************************************************************/

	IF OBJECT_ID('[Core].[SalesOrders]','U') IS NOT NULL
		DROP TABLE [Core].[SalesOrders]

	SELECT		CAST(soh.[HEADER_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))								AS [Header ID]
	,			CAST(soh.[ORDER_NUMBER] AS NVARCHAR(255))							AS [Order Number]
	,			CAST(soh.[ORG_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))								AS [Org ID]
	,			CAST(soh.[LEGAL_ENTITY_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Legal Entity ID]
	,			CAST(LEFT(soh.[ORDERED_DATE],10) AS DATE)	AS [Ordered Date]
	,			CAST(soh.[ORDER_TYPE_CODE] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Order Type Code]
	,			CAST(soh.[TRANSACTIONAL_CURRENCY_CODE] AS NVARCHAR(255))			AS [Transactional Currency Code]
	,			CAST(soh.[STATUS_CODE] AS NVARCHAR(255))							AS [Status Code]
	,			CAST(soh.[OPEN_FLAG] AS NVARCHAR(255))								AS [Open Flag]
	,			CAST(soh.[ON_HOLD] AS NVARCHAR(255))								AS [On Hold]
	,			CAST(soh.[CANCELED_FLAG] AS NVARCHAR(255))							AS [Canceled Flag]
	,			CAST(soh.[CHANGE_VERSION_NUMBER] AS NVARCHAR(255))					AS [Change Version Number]
	,			CAST(soh.[IS_EDITABLE] AS NVARCHAR(255))							AS [Is Editable]
	,			CAST(soh.[SOLD_TO_PARTY_ID]	 AS NVARCHAR(255))					AS [Sold To Party ID]
	,			CAST(soh.[PRICING_SEGMENT_CODE] AS NVARCHAR(255))					AS [Pricing Segment Code]
	,			CAST(soh.[PRICING_STRATEGY_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))					AS [Pricing Strategy ID]
	,			CAST(soh.[FULFILL_ORG_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Fulfill Org ID]
	,			CAST(soh.[REQUEST_SHIP_DATE] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Request Ship Date]
	,			CAST(soh.[CARRIER_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))							AS [Carrier ID]
	,			CAST(soh.[SHIP_MODE_OF_TRANSPORT] AS NVARCHAR(255))				AS [Ship Mode Of Transport]
	,			CAST(soh.[SHIP_CLASS_OF_SERVICE] AS NVARCHAR(255))					AS [Ship Class Of Service]
	,			CAST(soh.[SUBMITTED_FLAG] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Submitted Flag]
	,			CAST(soh.[REFERENCE_HEADER_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))					AS [Reference Header ID]
	,			CAST(soh.[PAYMENT_TERM_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Payment Term ID]
	,			CAST(soh.[MODIFIED_FLAG] AS NVARCHAR(255))							AS [Modified Flag]
	,			CAST(soh.[SUBMITTED_DATE] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Submitted Date]
	,			CAST(soh.[SUBMITTED_BY]	 AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Submitted By]
	,			CAST(soh.[MDO_FLAG]	 AS NVARCHAR(255))							AS [MDO Flag]
	,			CAST(soh.[SOLD_TO_PARTY_CONTACT_ID]	 AS NVARCHAR(255))			AS [Sold To Party Contact ID]
	,			CAST(soh.[SOLD_TO_PARTY_CONTACT_POINT_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))		AS [Sold To Party Contact Point ID]
	,			CAST(soh.[REQUEST_CANCEL_DATE]	 AS NVARCHAR(255))				AS [Request Cancel Date]
	,			CAST(soh.[CANCEL_REASON_CODE] AS NVARCHAR(255))					AS [Cancel Reason Code]
	,			CAST(soh.[CUSTOMER_PO_NUMBER] AS NVARCHAR(255))					AS [Customer PO Number]
	,			CAST(soh.[COMMENTS]	 AS NVARCHAR(255))							AS [Comments]
	,			CAST(soh.[AGREEMENT_HEADER_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))					AS [Agreement Header ID]
	,			CAST(soh.[AGREEMENT_VERSION_NUMBER]	 AS NVARCHAR(255))			AS [Agreement Version Number]
	,			CAST(sol.[LINE_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))								AS [Line ID]
	,			CAST(sol.[LINE_NUMBER] AS NVARCHAR(255))							AS [Line Number]
	,			CAST(sol.[STATUS_CODE] AS NVARCHAR(255))							AS [Order Line Status]
	,			CAST(ISNULL(sol.[ORDERED_QTY],0) AS NVARCHAR(255))					AS [Ordered Qty]
	,			CAST(sol.[ORDERED_UOM] AS NVARCHAR(255))							AS [Ordered UOM]
	,			CAST(sol.[EXTENDED_AMOUNT] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Extended Amount]
	,			CAST(sol.[INVENTORY_ITEM_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Inventory Item ID]
	,			CAST(sol.[UNIT_LIST_PRICE] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Unit List Price]
	,			CAST(sol.[UNIT_SELLING_PRICE] AS NVARCHAR(255))					AS [Unit Selling Price]
	,			CAST(sol.[REFERENCE_LINE_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Reference Line ID]
	,			CAST(sol.[INVENTORY_ORGANIZATION_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))				AS [Inventory Organization ID]
	,			CAST(sol.[DISPLAY_LINE_NUMBER]	 AS NVARCHAR(255))				AS [Display Line Number]
	,			CAST(sol.[SCHEDULE_SHIP_DATE] AS NVARCHAR(255))					AS [Schedule Ship Date]
	,			CAST(sol.[RMA_DELIVERED_QTY] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [RMA Delivered Qty]
	,			CAST(sol.[CANCELED_QTY]	 AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Canceled Qty]
	,			CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE)						AS [DateStamp]
	INTO		[Core].[SalesOrders]
	FROM		[RAW].[O.DOO_HEADERS_ALL] soh
	LEFT JOIN	[RAW].[O.DOO_LINES_ALL] sol
	ON			soh.[HEADER_ID] = sol.[HEADER_ID]
	WHERE		soh.[STATUS_CODE] <> 'DOO_REFERENCE'


/********************************************************************************************************
	Step 1.2	Create core invoice tables
********************************************************************************************************/

	IF OBJECT_ID('[Core].[APInvoices]','U') IS NOT NULL
		DROP TABLE [Core].[APInvoices]


	SELECT		CAST(apa.[INVOICE_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Invoice ID]
	,			CAST(apa.[PARTY_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))							AS [Party ID]
	,			CAST(apa.[VENDOR_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))							AS [Vendor ID]
	,			CAST(apa.[INVOICE_NUM] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Invoice Number]
	,			CAST(apa.[SET_OF_BOOKS_ID]	 AS NVARCHAR(255))				AS [Set of Books ID]
	,			CAST(apa.[INVOICE_CURRENCY_CODE] AS NVARCHAR(255))				AS [Invoice Currency Code]
	,			CAST(apa.[INVOICE_AMOUNT] AS NVARCHAR(255))					AS [Invoice Amount]
	,			CAST(apa.[VENDOR_SITE_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))					AS [Vendor Site ID]
	,			CAST(apa.[INVOICE_DATE] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Invoice Date]
	,			CAST(apa.[INVOICE_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE]	 AS NVARCHAR(255))		AS [Invoice Type Lookup Code]
	,			CAST(apa.[TERMS_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))							AS [Terms ID]
	,			CAST(apa.[PAYMENT_STATUS_FLAG] AS NVARCHAR(255))				AS [Payment Status Flag]
	,			CAST(apa.[APPROVAL_STATUS] AS NVARCHAR(255))					AS [Approval Status]
	,			CAST(apa.[ORG_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))							AS [Org ID]
	,			CAST(apa.[WFAPPROVAL_STATUS] AS NVARCHAR(255))					AS [Workflow Approval Status]
	,			CAST(apa.[LEGAL_ENTITY_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))					AS [Legal Entity ID]
	,			CAST(apa.[PAYMENT_METHOD_CODE] AS NVARCHAR(255))				AS [Payment Method Code]
	,			CAST(apa.[PARTY_SITE_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Party Site ID]
	,			CAST(apa.[PAY_PROC_TRXN_TYPE_CODE] AS NVARCHAR(255))			AS [Invoice Document Type]
	,			CAST(apa.[DESCRIPTION] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Description]
	,			CAST(apa.[AMOUNT_PAID] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Amount Paid]
	,			CAST(apa.[EXCHANGE_RATE] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Exchange Rate]
	,			CAST(apa.[TOTAL_TAX_AMOUNT]	 AS NVARCHAR(255))				AS [Total Tax Amount]
	,			CAST(apa.[PO_HEADER_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [PO Header ID]
	,			CAST(apl.[LINE_NUMBER] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Line Number]
	,			CAST(apl.[DESCRIPTION] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Invoice Line Description]
	,			CAST(apl.[LINE_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODE] AS NVARCHAR(255))				AS [Line Type Lookup Code]
	,			CAST(apl.[AMOUNT] AS NVARCHAR(255))							AS [Invoice Line Amount]
	,			CAST(apl.[CANCELLED_FLAG] AS NVARCHAR(255))					AS [Canelled Flag]
	,			CAST(apl.[TAX_RATE_CODE] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Tax Rate Code]
	,			CAST(apl.[TAX_RATE]	 AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Tax Rate]
	,			CAST(apl.[REQUESTER_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Requester ID]
	,			CAST(apl.[ITEM_DESCRIPTION] AS NVARCHAR(255))					AS [Invoice Line Item Description]
	,			CAST(apl.[QUANTITY_INVOICED] AS NVARCHAR(255))					AS [Quantity Invoiced]
	,			CAST(apl.[UNIT_MEAS_LOOKUP_CODE] AS NVARCHAR(255))				AS [UOM Code]
	,			CAST(apl.[UNIT_PRICE] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [Unit Price]
	,			CAST(apl.[PO_LINE_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [PO Line ID]
	,			CAST(apl.[PO_LINE_LOCATION_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))				AS [PO Line Location ID]
	,			CAST(apl.[PURCHASING_CATEGORY_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))			AS [Purchasing Category ID]
	,			CAST(apl.[SHIP_TO_LOCATION_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))				AS [Ship to Location ID]
	,			CAST(apl.[INVENTORY_ITEM_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))					AS [Inventory Item ID]
	,			CAST(apl.[RCV_TRANSACTION_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))				AS [Receiving Transaction ID]
	,			CAST(apl.[RCV_SHIPMENT_LINE_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))				AS [Receiving Shipment Line ID]
	,			CAST(apl.[SHIP_FROM_LOCATION_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))				AS [Ship From Location ID]
	,			CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE)						AS [DateStamp]
	INTO		[Core].[APInvoices]
	FROM		[RAW].[O.AP_INVOICES_ALL] apa
	LEFT JOIN	[RAW].[O.AP_INVOICE_LINES_ALL] apl
	ON			apa.[INVOICE_ID] = apl.[INVOICE_ID]

	,			CAST(arl.[CUSTOMER_TRX_LINE_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))		AS [CUSTOMER_TRX_LINE_ID]
	,			CAST(arl.[LINE_NUMBER] AS NVARCHAR(255))				AS [LINE_NUMBER]

	,			CAST(arl.[REVENUE_AMOUNT] AS NVARCHAR(255))				AS [REVENUE_AMOUNT]
	,			CAST(arl.[QUANTITY_ORDERED] AS NVARCHAR(255))			AS [QUANTITY_ORDERED]

	,			CAST(arl.[UOM_CODE] AS NVARCHAR(255))					AS [UOM_CODE]
	,			CAST(CAST(arl.[QUANTITY_CREDITED] AS FLOAT) AS DECIMAL(28,4))		AS [Quantity Credited]
	,			CAST(CAST(arl.[QUANTITY_INVOICED] AS FLOAT) AS DECIMAL(28,4))		AS [Line Quantity Invoiced]
	,			CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE)						AS [DateStamp]
	INTO		[Core].[ARInvoices]
	FROM		[RAW].[O.RA_CUSTOMER_TRX_ALL] ara
	LEFT JOIN	[RAW].[O.RA_CUSTOMER_TRX_LINES_ALL] arl

	,			CAST(imt.[SHIPMENT_NUMBER] AS NVARCHAR(255))							AS [SHIPMENT_NUMBER]

	,			CAST(imt.[SHIP_TO_LOCATION_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [SHIP_TO_LOCATION_ID]
	,			CAST(itt.[LANGUAGE] AS NVARCHAR(255))									AS [LANGUAGE]

	,			CAST(itrl.[LINE_ID]	 AS NVARCHAR(255))								AS [LINE_ID]
	,			CAST(itrl.[HEADER_ID]	 AS NVARCHAR(255))							AS [HEADER_ID]
	,			CAST(itrl.[LINE_NUMBER]	 AS NVARCHAR(255))							AS [LINE_NUMBER]
	,			CAST(itrl.[FROM_SUBINVENTORY_CODE] AS NVARCHAR(255))					AS [FROM_SUBINVENTORY_CODE]
	,			CAST(itrl.[UOM_CODE] AS NVARCHAR(255))									AS [UOM_CODE]
	,			CAST(itrl.[QUANTITY] AS NVARCHAR(255))									AS [QUANTITY]
	,			CAST(itrl.[DATE_REQUIRED] AS NVARCHAR(255))							AS [DATE_REQUIRED]
	,			CAST(itrl.[LINE_STATUS] AS NVARCHAR(255))								AS [LINE_STATUS]
	,			CAST(itrl.[QUANTITY_DELIVERED] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [QUANTITY_DELIVERED]
	,			CAST(itrl.[TO_SUBINVENTORY_CODE] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [TO_SUBINVENTORY_CODE]
	,			CAST(itrl.[REQUEST_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))								AS [REQUEST_ID]
	,			CAST(itrl.[ATTRIBUTE_TIMESTAMP1] AS NVARCHAR(255))						AS [ATTRIBUTE_TIMESTAMP1]
	,			CAST(itrl.[TRANSACTION_HEADER_ID] AS NVARCHAR(255))					AS [TRANSACTION_HEADER_ID]
	,			CAST(itrl.[ATTRIBUTE2] AS NVARCHAR(255))								AS [ATTRIBUTE2]
