/*==============================================================================================================================*
 * Project:		Argent																											*
 * Purpose:		Create the data marts that will feed into the Margin report.													*
 * Description:	1) Create Orders And Invoices data marts																		*																							
 * Prerequisites: Run tracability loop script.			 																		*
 *																																*
 * Outputs: Tables "Trade.PurchaseOrdersAndInvoices", "Trade.SalesOrdersAndInvoices", "Trade.TraceabilityAndOrders"				*
 *																																*
 * SQL ATR - Basic joins, LAG funtion used on Line 77, Simple maths used throughout												* 
 *																																*
 *																																*
 *																																*
 * Date:       29/07/2022																										*
 * Version:     1.0																												*																			
 *==============================================================================================================================*
 * Updates:																														*
 * Date		| Version | Author		| Change made																				*
 * -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*
 * --/--/-- |  1.-	  |				|																							*
 *			|		  |				|																							*
 *==============================================================================================================================*/

/********************************************************************************************************
	Step 3.1	Join invoices on to purchase orders to create [Trade].[PurchaseOrdersAndInvoice] table.

				If order number = previous row's order number then Invoice Amount = Invoice Line Amount
				If invoiced quantity > 0 then Invoice Amount = Invoice Line Amount
				Else Invoice Amount = Primary Quantity * Unit Price = Order Amount
********************************************************************************************************/

	IF OBJECT_ID('[Trade].[PurchaseOrdersAndInvoices]','U') IS NOT NULL
		DROP TABLE [Trade].[PurchaseOrdersAndInvoices]

	SELECT		po.[Purchase Order Number]																				AS [Order Number]
	,			CASE
					WHEN RIGHT(REPLACE(po.[Purchase Order Number],'T',''),2) IN ('O1','O2')
						THEN LEFT(REPLACE(po.[Purchase Order Number],'T',''),LEN(REPLACE(po.[Purchase Order Number],'T',''))-2)
					ELSE REPLACE(po.[Purchase Order Number],'T','')
				END																										AS [Parent Order]
	,			sn.[Supplier Name]																						AS [Supplier/Customer]
	,			s.[Supplier ID]																							AS [Supplier/Customer Number]
	,			ISNULL(pc.[Blanket Purchase Agreement Number],'')														AS [Agreement Number/Sales Contract Number]
	,			ISNULL(i.[Item Code],po.[Item Description])																AS [Item Code]
	,			po.[Item Description]
	,			i.[Category Code]
	,			po.[Unit Price]																							AS [Agreement Price]
	,			rt.[Primary Quantity]																					AS [Quantity]
	,			ap.[Unit Price]																							AS [Invoice Price]
	,			ap.[Quantity Invoiced]																					AS [Invoiced Quantity]
	,			ap.[Invoice Line Amount]																				AS [Invoice Line Amount]
	,			po.[Purchase Document Currency]																			AS [Currency]
	,			o.[Business Unit Name]																					AS [Business Unit]
	,			rt.[Inventory Organization Code]
	,			rt.[Inventory Organization Name] 																						
	,			po.[Ordered Quantity]		
	,			ap.[Approval Status]	
	,			p.[Mode of Transport]	
	,			po.[Incoterm]																							AS [Freight Terms]							
	,			ap.[Invoice Number]			
	,			po.[Purchase Document Status]																			AS [Order Status]
	,			CAST(LEFT(rt.[Transaction Date],10) AS DATE)															AS [Transaction Date]
	,			CASE
					WHEN po.[Purchase Order Number] = LAG(po.[Purchase Order Number])OVER(ORDER BY po.[Purchase Order Number],ap.[Invoice Line Amount] DESC)
						THEN	CASE
									WHEN ap.[Approval Status] IN ('NEEDS REAPPROVAL','NEVER APPROVED')
										THEN CAST(ap.[Unit Price] AS NUMERIC(28,2)) * CAST(ap.[Quantity Invoiced] AS NUMERIC(28,2))
									ELSE (-1) * CAST(ap.[Invoice Line Amount] AS NUMERIC(28,2))
								END
					WHEN CAST(ap.[Quantity Invoiced] AS NUMERIC(28,8)) > 0
						THEN	CASE
									WHEN ap.[Approval Status] IN ('NEEDS REAPPROVAL','NEVER APPROVED')
										THEN CAST(ap.[Unit Price] AS NUMERIC(28,2)) * CAST(ap.[Quantity Invoiced] AS NUMERIC(28,2))
									ELSE (-1) * CAST(ap.[Invoice Line Amount] AS NUMERIC(28,2))
								END
					ELSE (-1) * CAST(rt.[Primary Quantity] AS NUMERIC(28,2)) * CAST(po.[Unit Price] AS NUMERIC(28,2))
				END																										AS [Invoice Amount]
	,			fx.[EUR USD]
	,			fx.[EUR GBP]
	,			y.[Actual Yield]
	,			ln.[Lot Numbers]
	,			CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE)																	AS [DateStamp]
	INTO		[Trade].[PurchaseOrdersAndinvoices]
	FROM		[Core].[PurchaseOrders] po
	LEFT JOIN	[Core].[Suppliers] s
	ON			po.[Supplier] = s.[Vendor ID]
	AND			po.[Supplier Site] = s.[Vendor Site ID]
	LEFT JOIN	(
					SELECT		[Party ID]
					,			MIN([Party Name])	AS [Supplier Name]
					FROM		[Core].[Parties]
					GROUP BY	[Party ID]
				) sn
	ON			s.[Party ID] = sn.[Party ID]
	LEFT JOIN	(
					SELECT		[PO Header ID]
					,			[Blanket Purchase Agreement Number]
					FROM		[Core].[PurchaseContracts]
					GROUP BY	[PO Header ID]
					,			[Blanket Purchase Agreement Number]
				) pc
	ON			pc.[PO Header ID] = po.[From Header ID]
	LEFT JOIN	(
					SELECT		[Item Code]
					,			[Inventory Item ID]
					,			[Category Code]
					FROM		[Core].[Items]
					GROUP BY	[Item Code]
					,			[Inventory Item ID]
					,			[Category Code]
				) i 
	ON			i.[Inventory Item ID] = po.[Item ID]	
	LEFT JOIN	[Core].[APInvoices] ap
	ON			po.[PO Line ID] = ap.[PO Line ID]
	LEFT JOIN	(
					SELECT		[Business Unit ID]
					,			[Business Unit Name]
					FROM		[Core].[Organizations]
					GROUP BY	[Business Unit ID]
					,			[Business Unit Name]
				) o
	ON			po.[Procurement BU ID] = o.[Business Unit ID]
	LEFT JOIN	(
					SELECT		[Party ID]
					,			MIN([Party Name])	AS [Mode of Transport]
					FROM		[Core].[Parties]
					GROUP BY	[Party ID]
				) p
	ON			po.[Carrier ID] = p.[Party ID]
	LEFT JOIN	(
					SELECT		a.*
					,			b.[Inventory Organization Name]
					,			b.[Inventory Organization Code]	
					FROM		[Core].[ReceivingTransactions] a
					LEFT JOIN	[Core].[Organizations] b
					ON			a.[Organization ID] = b.[Organization ID]
					WHERE		[Transaction Type] = 'RECEIVE'
					AND			b.[Business Unit Name] IN ('BDA BU','Motherwell','Stanlow')
				) rt
	ON			po.[PO Line ID] = rt.[PO Line ID]
	AND			po.[PO Header ID] = rt.[PO Header ID]
	AND			(ap.[Receiving Transaction ID] = rt.[Transaction ID] OR ap.[Receiving Transaction ID] IS NULL)
	LEFT JOIN	[Core].[FXRates] fx
	ON			CAST([CONVERSION_DATE] AS DATE) = CAST(LEFT(rt.[Transaction Date],10) AS DATE)
	LEFT JOIN	(
					SELECT		[Business Unit]
					,			[Start date]
					,			[End date]
					,			AVG(CAST([Expected yield] AS DECIMAL(28,8))) AS [Actual Yield]
					FROM		[Trade].[Yield]
					GROUP BY	[Business Unit]
					,			[Start date]
					,			[End date]
				) y
	ON			o.[Business Unit Name] = y.[Business Unit]
	AND			CAST(LEFT(rt.[Transaction Date],10) AS DATE) BETWEEN CAST(y.[Start date] AS DATE) AND ISNULL(CAST(y.[End date] AS DATE),GETDATE())	
	LEFT JOIN	(
					SELECT		[Document Number]
					,			[Lot Numbers]
					FROM		[Trade].[Traceability]
					WHERE		[Transaction Type] = 'Purchase Order Receipt'
				) ln
	ON			ln.[Document Number] =  CASE
											WHEN RIGHT(REPLACE(po.[Purchase Order Number],'T',''),2) IN ('O1','O2')
												THEN LEFT(REPLACE(po.[Purchase Order Number],'T',''),LEN(REPLACE(po.[Purchase Order Number],'T',''))-2)
											ELSE REPLACE(po.[Purchase Order Number],'T','')
										END
	WHERE		[Purchase Order Number] NOT LIKE '%PU-%'
	AND			i.[Item Code] IS NOT NULL
	AND			[Purchase Document Status] NOT IN ('CANCELED','INCOMPLETE','OPEN')
	AND			o.[Business Unit Name] IN ('BDA BU','Motherwell','Stanlow')
	AND			CAST(LEFT(rt.[Transaction Date],10) AS DATE) >= '2021-01-01'

/********************************************************************************************************
	Step 3.2	Join invoices on to sales orders to create [Trade].[SalesOrdersAndInvoices] table.

				Invoice Amount = [UNIT_SELLING_PRICE] * ([Line Quantity Invoiced] - [Quantity Credited])
********************************************************************************************************/
	
	IF OBJECT_ID('[Trade].[SalesOrdersAndInvoices]','U') IS NOT NULL
		DROP TABLE [Trade].[SalesOrdersAndInvoices]

	SELECT		so.[Order Number]
	,			LEFT(so.[Order Number],5)																									AS [Parent Order]
	,			so.[Item Code]
	,			so.[Item Name]																												AS [Item Description]
	,			so.[Category Code]																							
	,			CAST(CASE WHEN ar.[UNIT_SELLING_PRICE] IS NULL THEN '0' ELSE ar.[UNIT_SELLING_PRICE] END AS NUMERIC(28,2))					AS [Invoice Price]
	,			CAST(CASE WHEN ar.[Line Quantity Invoiced] IS NULL THEN '0' ELSE ar.[Line Quantity Invoiced] END AS NUMERIC(28,2))
					- ABS(ISNULL(CAST(CASE WHEN ar.[Quantity Credited] IS NULL THEN '0' ELSE ar.[Quantity Credited] END AS NUMERIC(28,2)),0))	AS [Invoiced Quantity]
	,			so.[Unit of Measure]																											AS [Unit of Measure]
	,			CASE 
					WHEN so.[Unit of Measure]	 = 'LTR' 
						THEN (CAST(CASE WHEN ar.[Line Quantity Invoiced] IS NULL THEN '0' ELSE ar.[Line Quantity Invoiced] END AS NUMERIC(28,2))
							- ABS(ISNULL(CAST(CASE WHEN ar.[Quantity Credited] IS NULL THEN '0' ELSE ar.[Quantity Credited] END AS NUMERIC(28,2)),0))) * 0.0008745 
						ELSE CAST(CASE WHEN ar.[Line Quantity Invoiced] IS NULL THEN '0' ELSE ar.[Line Quantity Invoiced] END AS NUMERIC(28,2))
							- ABS(ISNULL(CAST(CASE WHEN ar.[Quantity Credited] IS NULL THEN '0' ELSE ar.[Quantity Credited] END AS NUMERIC(28,2)),0))
				END																															AS [Invoiced Quantity (TN)]	
	,			so.[Transactional Currency Code]
	,			o.[Business Unit Name]
	,			CAST(LEFT(ar.[TRX_DATE],10) AS DATE)																						AS [Transaction Date]
	,			IIF(CAST(CASE WHEN ar.[UNIT_SELLING_PRICE] IS NULL THEN '0' ELSE ar.[UNIT_SELLING_PRICE] END AS NUMERIC(28,2)) < 0
					,(-1) * CAST(CASE WHEN ar.[UNIT_SELLING_PRICE] IS NULL THEN '0' ELSE ar.[UNIT_SELLING_PRICE] END AS NUMERIC(28,2)) 
							* (CAST(CASE WHEN ar.[Line Quantity Invoiced] IS NULL THEN '0' ELSE ar.[Line Quantity Invoiced] END AS NUMERIC(28,2))
								- ABS(ISNULL(CAST(CASE WHEN ar.[Quantity Credited] IS NULL THEN '0' ELSE ar.[Quantity Credited] END AS NUMERIC(28,2)),0)))
					,CAST(CASE WHEN ar.[UNIT_SELLING_PRICE] IS NULL THEN '0' ELSE ar.[UNIT_SELLING_PRICE] END AS NUMERIC(28,2)) 
						* (CAST(CASE WHEN ar.[Line Quantity Invoiced] IS NULL THEN '0' ELSE ar.[Line Quantity Invoiced] END AS NUMERIC(28,2))
							- ABS(ISNULL(CAST(CASE WHEN ar.[Quantity Credited] IS NULL THEN '0' ELSE ar.[Quantity Credited] END AS NUMERIC(28,2)),0)))
					)																														AS [Invoice Amount]
	,			[EUR GBP]																													AS [EUR:GBP]
	,			[EUR USD]																													AS [EUR:USD]
	,			CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE)																	AS [DateStamp]
	INTO		[Trade].[SalesOrdersAndInvoices]
	FROM		(
					SELECT		DISTINCT [Order Number]
					,			[Transactional Currency Code]
					,			[Org ID]
					,			so.[Inventory Item ID]
					,			[Inventory Organization ID]
					,			i.[Unit of Measure]
					,			i.[Item Code]
					,			i.[Item Name]		
					,			i.[Category Code]
					FROM		[Core].[SalesOrders] so
					LEFT JOIN	[Core].[Items] i
					ON			i.[Inventory Item ID] = so.[Inventory Item ID]
					AND			i.[Organization ID] = so.[Inventory Organization ID]
					WHERE		i.[Category Code] NOT LIKE '%Services%'
				) so
	LEFT JOIN	[Core].[ARInvoices] ar
	ON			so.[Order Number] = ar.[SALES_ORDER]
	LEFT JOIN	(
					SELECT		[Business Unit ID]
					,			[Business Unit Name]
					FROM		[Core].[Organizations]
					GROUP BY	[Business Unit ID]
					,			[Business Unit Name]
				) o
	ON			so.[Org ID] = o.[Business Unit ID]
	LEFT JOIN	[Core].[FXRates] fx
	ON			CAST([CONVERSION_DATE] AS DATE) = CAST(LEFT(ar.[TRX_DATE],10) AS DATE)
	WHERE		o.[Business Unit Name] IN ('BDA BU','Motherwell','Stanlow')
	AND			CAST(LEFT(ar.[TRX_DATE],10) AS DATE) >= '2021-01-01'
	ORDER BY	so.[Order Number]

/********************************************************************************************************
	Step 3.3	Join [Trade].[PurchaseOrdersAndInvoices] on to [Trade].[TraceabilityLooped] to obtain the original
				PO value of each feedstock item that feeds into each biodiesel sale.
********************************************************************************************************/

	IF OBJECT_ID('[Trade].[TraceabilityAndOrders]','U') IS NOT NULL
		DROP TABLE [Trade].[TraceabilityAndOrders]

	SELECT		t.*
	,			o.[Parent Order]
	,			poi.[PO Item Code]
	,			poi.[PO Item Description]
	,			poi.[PO Item Category]
	,			o.[Invoice Amount]
	,			o.[PO Quantity]
	,			o.[Invoice Amount]/NULLIF(o.[PO Quantity],0) AS [Price per MT]
	,			o.[Lot Numbers] AS [Lot Numbers Orders Table]
	,			o.[PO Transaction Date]
	,			o.[Business Unit] AS [PO Business Unit]
	,			ISNULL(sodr.[Returned Flag],'0') AS [Returned Flag]
	INTO		[Trade].[TraceabilityAndOrders]
	FROM		[Trade].[TraceabilityLooped] t
	LEFT JOIN	(
					SELECT		[Business Unit]
					,			[Parent Order]
					,			SUM(CASE WHEN [Currency] = 'USD' THEN [Invoice Amount]/[EUR USD]
										 WHEN [Currency] = 'GBP' THEN [Invoice Amount]/[EUR GBP]
										 ELSE [Invoice Amount]
									END) AS [Invoice Amount]
					,			SUM(CAST(CASE
											WHEN [Category Code] LIKE '%Feedstock%' OR [Category Code] LIKE '%Biodiesel%'
												THEN IIF(CAST([Invoiced Quantity] AS DECIMAL(28,8)) = 0,[Invoiced Quantity],[Quantity])
											ELSE '0'
										 END AS DECIMAL(28,8))) AS [PO Quantity]
					,			MAX([Transaction Date]) AS [PO Transaction Date]
					,			[Lot Numbers]
					FROM		[Trade].[PurchaseOrdersAndInvoices]
					GROUP BY	[Business Unit]
					,			[Parent Order]
					,			[Lot Numbers]
				) o
	ON			COALESCE(t.[Lot Numbers_21]
						,t.[Lot Numbers_20]
						,t.[Lot Numbers_19]
						,t.[Lot Numbers_18]
						,t.[Lot Numbers_17]
						,t.[Lot Numbers_16]
						,t.[Lot Numbers_15]
						,t.[Lot Numbers_14]
						,t.[Lot Numbers_13]
						,t.[Lot Numbers_12]
						,t.[Lot Numbers_11]
						,t.[Lot Numbers_10]
						,t.[Lot Numbers_9]
						,t.[Lot Numbers_8]
						,t.[Lot Numbers_7]
						,t.[Lot Numbers_6]
						,t.[Lot Numbers_5]
						,t.[Lot Numbers_4]
						,t.[Lot Numbers_3]
						,t.[Lot Numbers_2]
						,t.[Lot Numbers]) = o.[Lot Numbers]	
	LEFT JOIN	(
					SELECT		[Parent Order]
					,			[Item Code]			AS [PO Item Code]
					,			[Item Description]	AS [PO Item Description]
					,			[Category Code]		AS [PO Item Category]
					FROM		[Trade].[PurchaseOrdersAndInvoices]		--20,098
					WHERE		[Category Code] <> 'Services.Services'
					GROUP BY	[Parent Order]
					,			[Item Code]
					,			[Item Description]
					,			[Category Code]
				) poi
	ON			o.[Parent Order] = poi.[Parent Order]
	LEFT JOIN	(
					SELECT		DISTINCT [Order Number]	
					,			[Line Number]
					,			'1' AS [Returned Flag]
					FROM		[Core].[SalesOrderDocumentReferences] sodr
					LEFT JOIN	[Core].[SalesOrders] so
					ON			sodr.[DOC_LINE_ID] = so.[Line ID]
					WHERE		[Line ID] IS NOT NULL
				) sodr
	ON			t.[SOURCE_HEADER_NUMBER] = sodr.[Order Number]	
	AND			t.[SOURCE_LINE_NUMBER] = sodr.[Line Number]
	ORDER BY	t.[CREATION_DATE]

/*==============================================================================================================================*
 * Project:		Argent																											*
 * Purpose:		Create the data marts that will feed into the Margin report.													*
 * Description:	1) Create sales order feedstock value data marts																*																							
 * Prerequisites: Run tracability loop script.			 																		*
 *																																*
 * Key Outputs: Tables "[Trade].[SalesOrderFeedstockValues_POLevel_BiodieselQuantity]"											*
					, "[Trade].[SalesOrderFeedstockValues_Summarised]"															*
 *																																*
 *																																*
 * Date:       29/07/2022																										*
 * Version:     1.0																												*																			
 *==============================================================================================================================*
 * Updates:																														*
 * Date		| Version | Author		| Change made																				*
 * -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*
 * --/--/-- |  1.-	  |				|																							*
 *			|		  |				|																							*
 *==============================================================================================================================*/
/********************************************************************************************************
	Step 4.1	Calculate the original value of feedstock used from the original PO. [Trade].[TraceabilityAndOrders]
				is not filtered for Returned Flag = 1 so that cost of sales for all order numbers can be calculated.
********************************************************************************************************/

	IF OBJECT_ID('[Trade].[POValues_RMA]','U') IS NOT NULL
		DROP TABLE [Trade].[POValues_RMA]

	SELECT		* 
	,			COALESCE([Quantity_21],[Quantity_19],[Quantity_17],[Quantity_15],[Quantity_13],[Quantity_11],[Quantity_9],[Quantity_7],[Quantity_5],[Quantity_3],[Quantity]) * [Price per MT] AS [PO Value]
	INTO		[Trade].[POValues_RMA]
	FROM		[Trade].[TraceabilityAndOrders]

/********************************************************************************************************
	Step 4.2	Use the quantities produced in each batch to calculate the value of feedstock from the original PO
				that is used to create the biodiesel batch.
********************************************************************************************************/

	IF OBJECT_ID('[Trade].[SalesOrderFeedstockValues_POLevel_RMA]','U') IS NOT NULL
		DROP TABLE [Trade].[SalesOrderFeedstockValues_POLevel_RMA]

	SELECT		[Physical Date]
	,			[Business Unit Name]
	,			[Document Number] AS [Sales Order Number]
	,			[Item Code]
	,			[Item Name]
	,			SUM(DISTINCT ABS([Quantity])) AS [Total Biodiesel Quantity in MT]
	,			SUM(DISTINCT ABS(CASE WHEN [Returned Flag] = '1' THEN 0 ELSE [Quantity] END)) AS [Total Biodiesel Quantity Not Returned]
	,			[Lot Numbers]
	,			[Parent Order] AS [Purchase Order]
	,			[PO Item Code]
	,			[PO Item Description]
	,			[PO Item Category]
	,			[PO Transaction Date]
	,			[PO Business Unit]
	,			SUM(COALESCE([Quantity_21],[Quantity_19],[Quantity_17],[Quantity_15],[Quantity_13],[Quantity_11],[Quantity_9],[Quantity_7],[Quantity_5],[Quantity_3],[Quantity]))	AS [PO Quantity Used]
	,			SUM([PO Value]) AS [PO Value Used]
	,			SUM(ABS(ISNULL(([Quantity]/[Quantity_2]),1) * ISNULL(([Quantity_3]/[Quantity_4]),1) * ISNULL(([Quantity_5]/[Quantity_6]),1) * ISNULL(([Quantity_7]/[Quantity_8]),1) * ISNULL(([Quantity_9]/[Quantity_10]),1) 
						* ISNULL(([Quantity_11]/[Quantity_12]),1) * ISNULL(([Quantity_13]/[Quantity_14]),1) * ISNULL(([Quantity_15]/[Quantity_16]),1) * ISNULL(([Quantity_17]/[Quantity_18]),1) * ISNULL(([Quantity_19]/[Quantity_20]),1) 
							* COALESCE([Quantity_21],[Quantity_19],[Quantity_17],[Quantity_15],[Quantity_13],[Quantity_11],[Quantity_9],[Quantity_7],[Quantity_5],[Quantity_3],[Quantity]))) AS [Feedstock Quantity]
	,			SUM(ABS(ISNULL(([Quantity]/[Quantity_2]),1) * ISNULL(([Quantity_3]/[Quantity_4]),1) * ISNULL(([Quantity_5]/[Quantity_6]),1) * ISNULL(([Quantity_7]/[Quantity_8]),1) * ISNULL(([Quantity_9]/[Quantity_10]),1) 
						* ISNULL(([Quantity_11]/[Quantity_12]),1) * ISNULL(([Quantity_13]/[Quantity_14]),1) * ISNULL(([Quantity_15]/[Quantity_16]),1) * ISNULL(([Quantity_17]/[Quantity_18]),1) * ISNULL(([Quantity_19]/[Quantity_20]),1) 
							* [PO Value])) AS [Feedstock Value]
	,			CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE) AS [DateStamp]
	,			[Returned Flag]
	INTO		[Trade].[SalesOrderFeedstockValues_POLevel_RMA]
	FROM		[Trade].[POValues_RMA]
	GROUP BY	[Physical Date]
	,			[Business Unit Name]
	,			[Document Number]
	,			[Item Code]
	,			[Item Name]
	,			[Lot Numbers]
	,			[Parent Order]
	,			[PO Item Code]
	,			[PO Item Description]
	,			[PO Item Category]
	,			[PO Transaction Date]
	,			[PO Business Unit]
	,			[Returned Flag]

/********************************************************************************************************
	Step 4.3	Calculate the biodiesel quantity that each PO has contributed to and also include yields.
********************************************************************************************************/

	IF OBJECT_ID('[Trade].[SalesOrderFeedstockValues_POLevel_BiodieselQuantity_RMA]','U') IS NOT NULL
		DROP TABLE [Trade].[SalesOrderFeedstockValues_POLevel_BiodieselQuantity_RMA]

	SELECT		po.*
	,			ABS(MAX([Total Biodiesel Quantity in MT])OVER(PARTITION BY [Sales Order Number], [Lot Numbers], [Total Biodiesel Quantity in MT])/NULLIF(SUM([Feedstock Quantity])OVER(PARTITION BY [Sales Order Number], [Lot Numbers], [Total Biodiesel Quantity in MT]),0)
					* [Feedstock Quantity]) AS [Biodiesel Quantity Row Level]
	,			y.[Actual Yield]
	INTO		[Trade].[SalesOrderFeedstockValues_POLevel_BiodieselQuantity_RMA]
	FROM		[Trade].[SalesOrderFeedstockValues_POLevel_RMA] po
	LEFT JOIN	(
					SELECT		[Business Unit]
					,			[Start date]
					,			[End date]
					,			AVG(CAST([Expected yield] AS DECIMAL(28,8))) AS [Actual Yield]
					FROM		[Trade].[Yield]
					GROUP BY	[Business Unit]
					,			[Start date]
					,			[End date]
				) y
	ON			po.[Business Unit Name] = y.[Business Unit]
	AND			CAST(LEFT([Physical Date],10) AS DATE) BETWEEN CAST(y.[Start date] AS DATE) AND ISNULL(CAST(y.[End date] AS DATE),GETDATE())

/********************************************************************************************************
	Step 4.4	Summarise results at the SO level.
********************************************************************************************************/

	IF OBJECT_ID('[Trade].[SalesOrderFeedstockValues_Summarised_RMA]','U') IS NOT NULL
		DROP TABLE [Trade].[SalesOrderFeedstockValues_Summarised_RMA]

	SELECT		CAST(LEFT([Physical Date],10) AS DATE)													AS [Physical Date]
	,			[Business Unit Name]
	,			[Sales Order Number]
	,			[Item Code]
	,			[Item Name] 
	,			so.[Sales Invoice Amount]
	,			SUM(ABS([Biodiesel Quantity Row Level]))												AS [Biodiesel Quantity in MT] 
	,			MAX(so.[Sales Invoice Amount])/SUM(ABS([Biodiesel Quantity Row Level]))					AS [Biodiesel Price]
	,			SUM(ABS([Feedstock Value]))																AS [Feedstock Value]
	,			SUM(CASE
						WHEN [Purchase Order] IS NULL
							THEN 0
						ELSE [Feedstock Quantity]
					END)																				AS [Feedstock Quantity in MT]
	,			SUM(ABS([Feedstock Value]))/SUM(CASE
													WHEN [Purchase Order] IS NULL
														THEN 0
													ELSE [Feedstock Quantity]
												END)													AS [Feedstock Price]
	,			y.[Actual Yield]
	,			IIF(so.[Sales Invoice Amount] IS NULL,'1','0') AS [Not Invoiced Flag]
	,			CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE) AS [DateStamp]
	INTO		[Trade].[SalesOrderFeedstockValues_Summarised_RMA]
	FROM		[Trade].[SalesOrderFeedstockValues_POLevel_BiodieselQuantity_RMA] t
	LEFT JOIN	(
					SELECT		[Parent Order]
					,			SUM(CASE
										WHEN [Transactional Currency Code] = 'GBP' THEN [Invoice Amount]/[EUR:GBP]
										WHEN [Transactional Currency Code] = 'USD' THEN [Invoice Amount]/[EUR:USD]
										ELSE [Invoice Amount] 
									END) AS [Sales Invoice Amount]
					FROM		[Trade].[SalesOrdersAndInvoices]
					GROUP BY	[Parent Order]
				) so		
	ON			t.[Sales Order Number] = so.[Parent Order]
	LEFT JOIN	(
					SELECT		[Business Unit]
					,			[Start date]
					,			[End date]
					,			AVG(CAST([Expected yield] AS DECIMAL(28,8))) AS [Actual Yield]
					FROM		[Trade].[Yield]
					GROUP BY	[Business Unit]
					,			[Start date]
					,			[End date]
				) y
	ON			t.[Business Unit Name] = y.[Business Unit]
	AND			CAST(LEFT([Physical Date],10) AS DATE) BETWEEN CAST(y.[Start date] AS DATE) AND ISNULL(CAST(y.[End date] AS DATE),GETDATE())
	GROUP BY	CAST(LEFT([Physical Date],10) AS DATE)
	,			[Business Unit Name]
	,			[Sales Order Number]
	,			[Item Code]
	,			[Item Name] 
	,			so.[Sales Invoice Amount]
	,			y.[Actual Yield]
	,			IIF(so.[Sales Invoice Amount] IS NULL,'1','0')



/********************************************************************************************************
	Step 4.5	Rerun Step 4.1 but with returned orders removed.
********************************************************************************************************/

	IF OBJECT_ID('[Trade].[POValues]','U') IS NOT NULL
		DROP TABLE [Trade].[POValues]

	SELECT		* 
	,			COALESCE([Quantity_21],[Quantity_19],[Quantity_17],[Quantity_15],[Quantity_13],[Quantity_11],[Quantity_9],[Quantity_7],[Quantity_5],[Quantity_3],[Quantity]) * [Price per MT] AS [PO Value]
	INTO		[Trade].[POValues]
	FROM		[Trade].[TraceabilityAndOrders]
	WHERE		[Returned Flag] <> '1'

/********************************************************************************************************
	Step 4.6	Rerun Step 4.2 but with returned orders removed.
********************************************************************************************************/

	IF OBJECT_ID('[Trade].[SalesOrderFeedstockValues_POLevel]','U') IS NOT NULL
		DROP TABLE [Trade].[SalesOrderFeedstockValues_POLevel]

	SELECT		[Physical Date]
	,			[Business Unit Name]
	,			[Document Number] AS [Sales Order Number]
	,			[Item Code]
	,			[Item Name]
	,			SUM(DISTINCT ABS([Quantity])) AS [Total Biodiesel Quantity in MT]
	,			[Lot Numbers]
	,			[Parent Order] AS [Purchase Order]
	,			[PO Item Code]
	,			[PO Item Description]
	,			[PO Item Category]
	,			[PO Transaction Date]
	,			[PO Business Unit]
	,			SUM(COALESCE([Quantity_21],[Quantity_19],[Quantity_17],[Quantity_15],[Quantity_13],[Quantity_11],[Quantity_9],[Quantity_7],[Quantity_5],[Quantity_3],[Quantity]))	AS [PO Quantity Used]
	,			SUM([PO Value]) AS [PO Value Used]
	,			SUM(ABS(ISNULL(([Quantity]/[Quantity_2]),1) * ISNULL(([Quantity_3]/[Quantity_4]),1) * ISNULL(([Quantity_5]/[Quantity_6]),1) * ISNULL(([Quantity_7]/[Quantity_8]),1) * ISNULL(([Quantity_9]/[Quantity_10]),1) 
						* ISNULL(([Quantity_11]/[Quantity_12]),1) * ISNULL(([Quantity_13]/[Quantity_14]),1) * ISNULL(([Quantity_15]/[Quantity_16]),1) * ISNULL(([Quantity_17]/[Quantity_18]),1) * ISNULL(([Quantity_19]/[Quantity_20]),1) 
							* COALESCE([Quantity_21],[Quantity_19],[Quantity_17],[Quantity_15],[Quantity_13],[Quantity_11],[Quantity_9],[Quantity_7],[Quantity_5],[Quantity_3],[Quantity]))) AS [Feedstock Quantity]
	,			SUM(ABS(ISNULL(([Quantity]/[Quantity_2]),1) * ISNULL(([Quantity_3]/[Quantity_4]),1) * ISNULL(([Quantity_5]/[Quantity_6]),1) * ISNULL(([Quantity_7]/[Quantity_8]),1) * ISNULL(([Quantity_9]/[Quantity_10]),1) 
						* ISNULL(([Quantity_11]/[Quantity_12]),1) * ISNULL(([Quantity_13]/[Quantity_14]),1) * ISNULL(([Quantity_15]/[Quantity_16]),1) * ISNULL(([Quantity_17]/[Quantity_18]),1) * ISNULL(([Quantity_19]/[Quantity_20]),1) 
							* [PO Value])) AS [Feedstock Value]
	,			CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE) AS [DateStamp]
	INTO		[Trade].[SalesOrderFeedstockValues_POLevel]
	FROM		[Trade].[POValues]
	GROUP BY	[Physical Date]
	,			[Business Unit Name]
	,			[Document Number]
	,			[Item Code]
	,			[Item Name]
	,			[Lot Numbers]
	,			[Parent Order]
	,			[PO Item Code]
	,			[PO Item Description]
	,			[PO Item Category]
	,			[PO Transaction Date]
	,			[PO Business Unit]

/********************************************************************************************************
	Step 4.7	Rerun Step 4.3 but with returned orders removed.
********************************************************************************************************/

	IF OBJECT_ID('[Trade].[SalesOrderFeedstockValues_POLevel_BiodieselQuantity]','U') IS NOT NULL
		DROP TABLE [Trade].[SalesOrderFeedstockValues_POLevel_BiodieselQuantity]

	SELECT		po.*
	,			ABS(MAX([Total Biodiesel Quantity in MT])OVER(PARTITION BY [Sales Order Number], [Lot Numbers], [Total Biodiesel Quantity in MT])/NULLIF(SUM([Feedstock Quantity])OVER(PARTITION BY [Sales Order Number], [Lot Numbers], [Total Biodiesel Quantity in MT]),0)
					* [Feedstock Quantity]) AS [Biodiesel Quantity Row Level]
	,			y.[Actual Yield]
	INTO		[Trade].[SalesOrderFeedstockValues_POLevel_BiodieselQuantity]
	FROM		[Trade].[SalesOrderFeedstockValues_POLevel] po
	LEFT JOIN	(
					SELECT		[Business Unit]
					,			[Start date]
					,			[End date]
					,			AVG(CAST([Expected yield] AS DECIMAL(28,8))) AS [Actual Yield]
					FROM		[Trade].[Yield]
					GROUP BY	[Business Unit]
					,			[Start date]
					,			[End date]
				) y
	ON			po.[Business Unit Name] = y.[Business Unit]
	AND			CAST(LEFT([Physical Date],10) AS DATE) BETWEEN CAST(y.[Start date] AS DATE) AND ISNULL(CAST(y.[End date] AS DATE),GETDATE())

/********************************************************************************************************
	Step 4.8	Rerun Step 4.4 but with returned orders removed.
********************************************************************************************************/

	IF OBJECT_ID('[Trade].[SalesOrderFeedstockValues_Summarised_PreRMAAdjustment]','U') IS NOT NULL
		DROP TABLE [Trade].[SalesOrderFeedstockValues_Summarised_PreRMAAdjustment]

	SELECT		CAST(LEFT([Physical Date],10) AS DATE)													AS [Physical Date]
	,			[Business Unit Name]
	,			[Sales Order Number]
	,			[Item Code]
	,			[Item Name] 
	,			so.[Sales Invoice Amount]
	,			SUM(ABS([Biodiesel Quantity Row Level]))												AS [Biodiesel Quantity in MT] 
	,			MAX(so.[Sales Invoice Amount])/SUM(ABS([Biodiesel Quantity Row Level]))					AS [Biodiesel Price]
	,			SUM(ABS([Feedstock Value]))																AS [Feedstock Value]
	,			SUM(CASE
						WHEN [Purchase Order] IS NULL
							THEN 0
						ELSE [Feedstock Quantity]
					END)																				AS [Feedstock Quantity in MT]
	,			SUM(ABS([Feedstock Value]))/SUM(CASE
													WHEN [Purchase Order] IS NULL
														THEN 0
													ELSE [Feedstock Quantity]
												END)													AS [Feedstock Price]
	,			y.[Actual Yield]
	,			IIF(so.[Sales Invoice Amount] IS NULL,'1','0') AS [Not Invoiced Flag]
	,			CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE) AS [DateStamp]
	INTO		[Trade].[SalesOrderFeedstockValues_Summarised_PreRMAAdjustment]
	FROM		[Trade].[SalesOrderFeedstockValues_POLevel_BiodieselQuantity] t
	LEFT JOIN	(
					SELECT		[Parent Order]
					,			SUM(CASE
										WHEN [Transactional Currency Code] = 'GBP' THEN [Invoice Amount]/[EUR:GBP]
										WHEN [Transactional Currency Code] = 'USD' THEN [Invoice Amount]/[EUR:USD]
										ELSE [Invoice Amount] 
									END) AS [Sales Invoice Amount]
					FROM		[Trade].[SalesOrdersAndInvoices]
					GROUP BY	[Parent Order]
				) so		
	ON			t.[Sales Order Number] = so.[Parent Order]
	LEFT JOIN	(
					SELECT		[Business Unit]
					,			[Start date]
					,			[End date]
					,			AVG(CAST([Expected yield] AS DECIMAL(28,8))) AS [Actual Yield]
					FROM		[Trade].[Yield]
					GROUP BY	[Business Unit]
					,			[Start date]
					,			[End date]
				) y
	ON			t.[Business Unit Name] = y.[Business Unit]
	AND			CAST(LEFT([Physical Date],10) AS DATE) BETWEEN CAST(y.[Start date] AS DATE) AND ISNULL(CAST(y.[End date] AS DATE),GETDATE())
	GROUP BY	CAST(LEFT([Physical Date],10) AS DATE)
	,			[Business Unit Name]
	,			[Sales Order Number]
	,			[Item Code]
	,			[Item Name] 
	,			so.[Sales Invoice Amount]
	,			y.[Actual Yield]
	,			IIF(so.[Sales Invoice Amount] IS NULL,'1','0')

/********************************************************************************************************
	Step 4.9	Returned and resold biodiesel batches are linked using an RMA receipt number. This section calculates the 
				feedstock value on the original order for biodiesel that has returned and been resold.
********************************************************************************************************/

	IF OBJECT_ID('[Trade].[RMA_Adjustments]','U') IS NOT NULL
		DROP TABLE [Trade].[RMA_Adjustments]

	SELECT		* 
	INTO		[Trade].[RMA_Adjustments] 
	FROM		(
					SELECT		t.[Document Number] AS [Sales Order Number]
					,			SUM(DISTINCT (t.[Quantity]/oq.[Quantity]) * [Feedstock Value]) AS [RMA Feedstock Value]
					,			SUM(DISTINCT (t.[Quantity]/oq.[Quantity]) * [Feedstock Quantity in MT]) AS [RMA Feedstock Quantity]
					FROM		[Trade].[TraceabilityAndOrders] t
					LEFT JOIN	(
									SELECT		*
									FROM		[Trade].[Traceability]
									WHERE		[Transaction Type] = 'RMA Receipt'
								) rmar
					ON			COALESCE(t.[Lot Numbers_19],t.[Lot Numbers_18],t.[Lot Numbers_17],t.[Lot Numbers_16],t.[Lot Numbers_15],t.[Lot Numbers_14],t.[Lot Numbers_13],t.[Lot Numbers_12],t.[Lot Numbers_11],t.[Lot Numbers_10]
										,t.[Lot Numbers_9],t.[Lot Numbers_8],t.[Lot Numbers_7],t.[Lot Numbers_6],t.[Lot Numbers_5],t.[Lot Numbers_4],t.[Lot Numbers_3],t.[Lot Numbers_2],t.[Lot Numbers]) = rmar.[Lot Numbers]
					LEFT JOIN	(
									SELECT		*
									FROM		[Core].[SalesOrders]
								) so
					ON			so.[Order Number] = rmar.[Document Number]
					LEFT JOIN	(
									SELECT		*
									FROM		[Core].[SalesOrderDocumentReferences]
								) ddr
					ON			so.[Header ID] = ddr.[HEADER_ID]
					AND			ddr.[DOC_REF_TYPE] = 'ORIGINAL_SALES_ORDER'
					LEFT JOIN	(
									SELECT		[Sales Order Number]
									,			[Feedstock Value]
									,			[Feedstock Quantity in MT]
									,			[Biodiesel Quantity in MT]
									FROM		[Trade].[SalesOrderFeedstockValues_Summarised_RMA]
								) ocos
					ON			ddr.[DOC_USER_KEY] = ocos.[Sales Order Number]
					LEFT JOIN	(
									SELECT		[Document Number]
									,			SUM([Quantity]) AS [Quantity]
									FROM		[Trade].[Traceability]
									WHERE		[Transaction Type] = 'Sales Order Issue'
									GROUP BY	[Document Number]
								) oq
					ON			ddr.[DOC_USER_KEY] = oq.[Document Number]
					WHERE		t.[Parent Order] IS NULL
					GROUP BY	t.[Document Number]
				) x
	WHERE		[RMA Feedstock Value] IS NOT NULL

/********************************************************************************************************
	Step 4.10	Summarise [Trade].[SalesOrderFeedstockValues_Summarised_PreRMAAdjustment] at the SO level
				and include the RMA adjustments so that resold biodiesel has the correct cost of sales value.
********************************************************************************************************/

	IF OBJECT_ID('[Trade].[SalesOrderFeedstockValues_Summarised]','U') IS NOT NULL
		DROP TABLE [Trade].[SalesOrderFeedstockValues_Summarised]

	SELECT		[Physical Date]
	,			[Business Unit Name]
	,			sofv.[Sales Order Number]
	,			[Item Code]
	,			[Item Name]
	,			[Sales Invoice Amount]
	,			[Biodiesel Quantity in MT]
	,			[Biodiesel Price]
	,			ISNULL([Feedstock Value],0) + ISNULL([RMA Feedstock Value],0) AS [Feedstock Value]
	,			ISNULL([Feedstock Quantity in MT],0) + ISNULL([RMA Feedstock Quantity],0) AS [Feedstock Quantity in MT]
	,			ISNULL((ISNULL([Feedstock Value],0) + ISNULL([RMA Feedstock Value],0))/NULLIF((ISNULL([Feedstock Quantity in MT],0) + ISNULL([RMA Feedstock Quantity],0)),0),0) AS [Feedstock Price]
	,			[Actual Yield]
	,			[Not Invoiced Flag]
	,			[DateStamp]
	INTO		[Trade].[SalesOrderFeedstockValues_Summarised]
	FROM		[Trade].[SalesOrderFeedstockValues_Summarised_PreRMAAdjustment] sofv
	LEFT JOIN	[Trade].[RMA_Adjustments]  rma
	ON			sofv.[Sales Order Number] = rma.[Sales Order Number]

/*==============================================================================================================================*
 * Project:		Argent																											*
 * Purpose:		Find the feedstock items that have been used to create each biodiesel sale										*
 * Description:	1) Create the traceability table which contains all movements of feedstock/biodiesel and the quantities involved*																							
 *				2) Self join the traceability table multiple times to trace each biodiesel sale back to the feedstock items	    *
 *				   that have been purchased.																					*
 * Prerequisites: Run Core tables script.			 																			*
 *																																*
 * Outputs: Tables "Trade.Traceability", "Trade.TraceabilityLooped"																*
 *																																*
 *																																*
 * Date:       29/07/2022																										*
 * Version:     1.0																												*	
 *																																*
 * SQL ATR - Complicated process but made up of basic joins.																	* 
 *																																*																		
 *==============================================================================================================================*
 * Updates:																														*
 * Date		| Version | Author		| Change made																				*
 * -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*
 * --/--/-- |  1.-	  |				|																							*
 *			|		  |				|																							*
 *==============================================================================================================================*/
/********************************************************************************************************
	Step 2.1	Create traceability table.

				This table is built using [Core].[InventoryTransactions], [Core].[ShippingDetails],
				[Core].[SalesOrders], [Core].[SalesOrders_Fulfilled], [Core].[Organizations], [Core].[ReceivingTransactions],
				[Core].[PurchaseOrders], [Core].[InventoryLotNumberTransactions] and [Core].[InventoryLotNumbers].

				The table contains details all movements of inventory items throughout the business. This includes all feedstock items
				that have been purchased, the quantity of every feedstock/biodiesel batch that gets created as well as the quantities of
				the items used to produce them and also the details of the biodiesel sold.
********************************************************************************************************/
	IF OBJECT_ID('[Trade].[Traceability]','U') IS NOT NULL
		DROP TABLE [Trade].[Traceability]

	SELECT		o.[Business Unit Name]
	,			it.[SUBINVENTORY_CODE]																	AS [Subinventory]
	,			COALESCE(
							LEFT(it.[ATTRIBUTE_TIMESTAMP1],10)
						,	LEFT(rt.[ATTRIBUTE_TIMESTAMP2],10)
						,	CASE
								WHEN so.[Comments] LIKE '%Time Off Site%'
									THEN 
										CONCAT(
											RIGHT(SUBSTRING(so.[Comments],CHARINDEX('Time Off Site',so.[Comments])+14,10),4)
										,	SUBSTRING(SUBSTRING(so.[Comments],CHARINDEX('Time Off Site',so.[Comments])+14,10),3,4)
										,	LEFT(SUBSTRING(so.[Comments],CHARINDEX('Time Off Site',so.[Comments])+14,10),2)
										)
								ELSE so.[Schedule Ship Date]
							END
						,	LEFT(sof.[REQUEST_SHIP_DATE],10)
						,	LEFT(it.[TRANSACTION_DATE],10)
						)																				AS [Physical Date]
	,			COALESCE(
							po.[Purchase Order Number]
						,	so.[Order Number]
						,	it.[TRANSACTION_SOURCE_NAME]
						,	it.[TRANSACTION_REFERENCE]	
						,	rsh.[RA_DOCUMENT_NUMBER]
						)																				AS [Document Number]
	,			it.[TRANSACTION_TYPE_NAME]																AS [Transaction Type]
	,			i.[Item Code]
	,			i.[Item Name]
	,			i.[Unit of Measure]											
	,			CAST(ilnt.[PRIMARY_QUANTITY] AS NUMERIC(28,8))											AS [Quantity]
	,			it.[TRANSFER_SUBINVENTORY]																AS [Transfer Subinventory]
	,			ilnt.[LOT_NUMBER]																		AS [Lot Numbers]
	,			it.[TRANSACTION_ID]																		AS [Transaction ID]
	,			it.[CREATION_DATE]
	,			it.[TRANSACTION_DATE]
	,			sd.[SOURCE_HEADER_NUMBER]
	,			sd.[SOURCE_LINE_NUMBER]
	,			CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE)																	AS [DateStamp]
	INTO		[Trade].[Traceability]
	FROM		[Core].[InventoryTransactions] it
	LEFT JOIN	[Core].[ShippingDetails] sd
	ON			it.[TRX_SOURCE_LINE_ID] = sd.[DELIVERY_DETAIL_ID]
	AND			it.[TRANSACTION_SOURCE_TYPE_ID] = '2'		
	LEFT JOIN	(
					SELECT		[Header ID]
					,			[Order Number]
					,			[Comments]
					,			MAX([Schedule Ship Date]) AS [Schedule Ship Date]
					,			[Submitted Flag]
					FROM		[Core].[SalesOrders]
					GROUP BY	[Header ID]
					,			[Order Number]
					,			[Comments]
					,			[Submitted Flag]
				) so
	ON			so.[Order Number] = sd.[SOURCE_HEADER_NUMBER]
	AND			so.[Submitted Flag] = 'Y'	
	LEFT JOIN	[Core].[SalesOrders_Fulfilled] sof
	ON			so.[Header ID] = sof.[HEADER_ID]
	AND			sof.[FULFILL_LINE_ID] = sd.[SOURCE_SHIPMENT_ID]
	LEFT JOIN	[Core].[Organizations] o
	ON			o.[Organization ID] = it.[ORGANIZATION_ID]
	LEFT JOIN	[Core].[Items] i
	ON			i.[Inventory Item ID] = it.[INVENTORY_ITEM_ID]
	AND			i.[Organization ID] = it.[ORGANIZATION_ID]
	LEFT JOIN	[Core].[ReceivingTransactions] rt
	ON			rt.[Transaction ID] = it.[RCV_TRANSACTION_ID]
	LEFT JOIN	[Core].[ReceivingShipmentHeaders] rsh
	ON			rt.[Receipt Advice Header ID] = rsh.[SHIPMENT_HEADER_ID]
    AND			rt.[Source Document Code] = 'RMA'
    AND			rt.[Transaction Type] = 'DELIVER'
	LEFT JOIN	[Core].[PurchaseOrders] po
	ON			po.[PO Header ID] = rt.[PO Header ID]
	AND			po.[PO Line ID] = rt.[PO Line ID]
	LEFT JOIN	[Core].[InventoryLotNumberTransactions] ilnt
	ON			ilnt.[TRANSACTION_ID] = it.[TRANSACTION_ID]
	LEFT JOIN	[Core].[InventoryLotNumbers] iln
	ON			iln.[LOT_NUMBER] = ilnt.[LOT_NUMBER]
	AND			iln.[ORGANIZATION_ID] = o.[Organization ID]
	AND			iln.[LOT_ATTRIBUTE_CATEGORY] IN ('Biodiesel','AENL Weigh Bridge')
	WHERE		o.[Business Unit Name] IN ('BDA BU','Motherwell','Stanlow')
	AND			o.[Inventory Organization Code] IN ('BDA','MBDR','MBLD''MCOM','MPTP','SBDR','SBLD','SCOM','SPOP','SPTP')
	AND			LEFT(it.[TRANSACTION_DATE],10) >= '2021-01-01'

/********************************************************************************************************
	Step 2.2	Find the feedstock items that feed into each biodiesel batch.

				This table is built by left joining [Trade].[Traceability] onto itself multiple times.
********************************************************************************************************/

	LEFT JOIN	(
					SELECT		*
					FROM		[Trade].[Traceability]
					WHERE		[Transaction Type] = 'Work in Process Material Issue'
					AND			([Item Code] IN ('PR00900','PR00220','PR00150','PR00102','PR00100')
					OR			[Item Code] LIKE 'FS%')
				) t17
	ON			t16.[Document Number] = t17.[Document Number]
	LEFT JOIN	(
					SELECT		*
					FROM		[Trade].[Traceability]
					WHERE		[Transaction Type] = 'Work in Process Product Completion'
					AND			([Item Code] IN ('PR00900','PR00220','PR00150','PR00102','PR00100')
					OR			[Item Code] LIKE 'FS%')
				) t18
	ON			t17.[Lot Numbers] = t18.[Lot Numbers]
	LEFT JOIN	(
					SELECT		*
					FROM		[Trade].[Traceability]
					WHERE		[Transaction Type] = 'Work in Process Material Issue'
					AND			([Item Code] IN ('PR00900','PR00220','PR00150','PR00102','PR00100')
					OR			[Item Code] LIKE 'FS%')
				) t19
	ON			t18.[Document Number] = t19.[Document Number]
	LEFT JOIN	(
					SELECT		*
					FROM		[Trade].[Traceability]
					WHERE		[Transaction Type] = 'Work in Process Product Completion'
					AND			([Item Code] IN ('PR00900','PR00220','PR00150','PR00102','PR00100')
					OR			[Item Code] LIKE 'FS%')
				) t20
	ON			t19.[Lot Numbers] = t20.[Lot Numbers]
	LEFT JOIN	(
					SELECT		*
					FROM		[Trade].[Traceability]
					WHERE		[Transaction Type] = 'Work in Process Material Issue'
					AND			([Item Code] IN ('PR00900','PR00220','PR00150','PR00102','PR00100')
					OR			[Item Code] LIKE 'FS%')
				) t21
	ON			t20.[Document Number] = t21.[Document Number]
	WHERE		t1.[Transaction Type] = 'Sales Order Issue'
	AND			t1.[Item Code] IN ('PR00900','PR00220','PR00150','PR00102','PR00100')

/********************************************************************************************************
	1.1 Update the raw tables with the current day's data, pulled from the data warehouse.
********************************************************************************************************/

	DECLARE @DeleteTableStatement NVARCHAR(MAX)
	DECLARE Cur2 CURSOR READ_ONLY
	FOR
			SELECT  'Delete from [RAW].[' + TABLE_NAME + ']  where stamp <> (select distinct max(stamp) from [RAW].[' + TABLE_NAME + '])'
			FROM    INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES
			WHERE   TABLE_SCHEMA = 'RAW'
					AND TABLE_TYPE = 'BASE TABLE' and TABLE_NAME like 'RAW.P.%'


	OPEN Cur2
	FETCH NEXT FROM Cur2 INTO @DeleteTableStatement
	WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0
		  BEGIN
				PRINT 'Executing ' + @DeleteTableStatement
				EXECUTE sp_executesql @DeleteTableStatement
				FETCH NEXT FROM Cur2 INTO @DeleteTableStatement
		  END
	CLOSE Cur2
	DEALLOCATE Cur2

/***************************************************
Drop list of dates*/

IF OBJECT_ID('[RAW].[DateList]','U') IS NOT NULL 
		DROP TABLE [RAW].[DateList]

/***************************************************
Declare variables to produce list of dates*/

-- prevent set or regional settings from interfering with 
-- interpretation of dates / literals
SET DATEFIRST  1, -- 1 = Monday, 7 = Sunday
    DATEFORMAT mdy, 
    LANGUAGE   BRITISH;
-- assume the above is here in all subsequent code blocks.

--DECLARE @StartDate  date = '20190101';

--DECLARE @CutoffDate date = DATEADD(DAY, -1, DATEADD(YEAR, 4, @StartDate));

DECLARE @StartDate  date = '20181211';

DECLARE @CutoffDate date =	(
								SELECT	MAX([Date])
								FROM	(
											SELECT CAST([Date] AS DATE) AS [Date] FROM [RAW].[RAW.P.Argus Pricing]
											UNION ALL
											SELECT CAST([Date] AS DATE) AS [Date] FROM [RAW].[RAW.P.Reuters MGO Pricing]
											UNION ALL
											SELECT CAST([Date] AS DATE) AS [Date] FROM [RAW].[RAW.P.Reuters Pricing]
										)d
							);

/***************************************************
Create list of dates and insert into table*/

;WITH seq(n) AS 
(
  SELECT 0 UNION ALL SELECT n + 1 FROM seq
  WHERE n < DATEDIFF(DAY, @StartDate, @CutoffDate)
),
d([Date]) AS 
(
  SELECT DATEADD(DAY, n, @StartDate) FROM seq
)
SELECT [Date] 
INTO [RAW].[DateList]
FROM d
ORDER BY [Date]
OPTION (MAXRECURSION 0);

--1461

/***************************************************
Join Pricing table to DateList on a 1=1 basis*/

IF OBJECT_ID('[Core].[PreJoinArgusPricing]','U') IS NOT NULL 
		DROP TABLE [Core].[PreJoinArgusPricing]

SELECT * 
INTO [Core].[PreJoinArgusPricing]
FROM [RAW].[DateList]
LEFT JOIN  (SELECT DISTINCT	CAST([Description] AS NVARCHAR(250)) AS [Description]
							,[Contract/Delivery]
							,[Time Stamp]
							,[Price Type]
							,[Currency/Unit]
							,[Delivery Mode]
							,[Fill Type]	
							, 'Argus' AS [Source]		
			FROM [RAW].[RAW.P.Argus Pricing]) REF
ON 1=1

UNION ALL

SELECT		dl.[Date] AS [Date]
,			[Description] AS [Description]
,			'' AS [Contract/Delivery]
,			'' AS [Time Stamp]
,			[Price Type] 
,			'' AS [Currency/Unit]
,			'' AS [Delivery Mode]
,			'' AS [Fill Type]
,			'Reuters' AS [Source]
FROM		[RAW].[DateList] dl
LEFT JOIN	(
				SELECT		DISTINCT CAST([Description] AS NVARCHAR(250)) AS [Description]
				,			[Price Type]
				FROM		[RAW].[RAW.P.Reuters MGO Pricing]
			) mgo
ON			1=1

UNION ALL

SELECT		dl.[Date] AS [Date]
,			[Description] AS [Description]
,			'' AS [Contract/Delivery]
,			'' AS [Time Stamp]
,			[Price Type] 
,			'' AS [Currency/Unit]
,			'' AS [Delivery Mode]
,			'' AS [Fill Type]
,			'Reuters' AS [Source]
FROM		[RAW].[DateList] dl
LEFT JOIN	(
				SELECT		DISTINCT CAST([Description] AS NVARCHAR(250)) AS [Description]
				,			[Price Type]
				FROM		[RAW].[RAW.P.Reuters Pricing]
				WHERE		[Description] NOT LIKE 'EUR%'
				AND			[Date] IS NOT NULL
			) rp
ON			1=1

--33603

/***************************************************
Simplify fuel price descriptions*/

IF OBJECT_ID('[Core].[DescIDArgusPricing]','U') IS NOT NULL 
		DROP TABLE [Core].[DescIDArgusPricing]

SELECT DISTINCT 
		PJ.*,
--		PJ.[Description] + '_' + PJ.[Price Type] AS [DescPT],
--		CASE 
--		WHEN PJ.[Description] = 'Biodiesel Palm OME RED ARA range barge fob'										THEN 'Argus_Fuel_Price1'
--		WHEN PJ.[Description] = 'Biodiesel FAME 0C CFPP RED ARA range barge fob'									THEN 'Argus_Fuel_Price2'
--		WHEN PJ.[Description] = 'Biodiesel palm oil mill effluent RED Malaysia/Indonesia fob'						THEN 'Argus_Fuel_Price3'
--		WHEN PJ.[Description] = 'Biodiesel Rapeseed OME RED ARA range barge fob'									THEN 'Argus_Fuel_Price4'
--		WHEN PJ.[Description] = 'Biodiesel tallow OME RED ARA range barge fob'										THEN 'Argus_Fuel_Price5'
--		WHEN PJ.[Description] = 'UCO (used cooking oil) cif ARA USD/t'												THEN 'Argus_Fuel_Price6'
--		WHEN PJ.[Description] = 'UCO (used cooking oil) fob China'													THEN 'Argus_Fuel_Price7'
--		WHEN PJ.[Description] = 'Biodiesel UCOME (used cooking oil) RED ARA range barge fob'						THEN 'Argus_Fuel_Price8'
--		WHEN PJ.[Description] = 'HVO (hydrotreated vegetable oil) fob ARA range (Class I) USD/t'					THEN 'Argus_Fuel_Price9'
--		WHEN PJ.[Description] = 'HVO (hydrotreated vegetable oil) fob ARA range (Class II) USD/t'					THEN 'Argus_Fuel_Price10'
--		WHEN PJ.[Description] = 'HVO (hydrotreated vegetable oil) fob ARA range (Class III) USD/t'					THEN 'Argus_Fuel_Price11'
--		WHEN PJ.[Description] = 'Palm oil futures Bursa Malaysia month'												THEN 'Argus_Fuel_Price12'
--		WHEN PJ.[Description] = 'Rapeseed oil fob Dutch Mill RSO'													THEN 'Argus_Fuel_Price13'
--		WHEN PJ.[Description] = 'SAF (sustainable aviation fuel) fob ARA range (Class II) USD/t'					THEN 'Argus_Fuel_Price14'
--		WHEN PJ.[Description] = 'Tallow (categories 1 & 2) fca northwest Europe EUR/t'								THEN 'Argus_Fuel_Price15'
--		WHEN PJ.[Description] = 'Freight PME Malaysia - ARA 3-5kt'													THEN 'Argus_Fuel_Price16'
--		WHEN PJ.[Description] = 'UCO (used cooking oil) RED bulk China fob'											THEN 'Argus_Fuel_Price17'
--		WHEN PJ.[Description] = 'Gasoil NWE 7-28 day swaps'															THEN 'Argus_Fuel_Price18'
--		WHEN PJ.[Description] = 'Soybean oil Argentina waterborne fob upriver USD/t month'							THEN 'Argus_Fuel_Price19'
--		WHEN PJ.[Description] = 'Biofuel soybean oil Argentina vs CBOT waterborne fob San Lorenzo'--high				THEN 'Argus_Fuel_Price20'
--		WHEN PJ.[Description] = 'Biofuel soybean oil Argentina vs CBOT waterborne fob San Lorenzo'--low					THEN 'Argus_Fuel_Price21'
--		WHEN PJ.[Description] = 'Biodiesel SME Argentina waterborne fob upriver'									THEN 'Argus_Fuel_Price22'
--		WHEN PJ.[Description] = 'Biodiesel UCOME (used cooking oil) RED bulk China fob'								THEN 'Argus_Fuel_Price23'
--		ELSE 'ERROR' END AS [Description ID],
		AP.[Value]
--		ISNULL(AP.[value],LAG(AP.[value],33602,-999) OVER(ORDER BY PJ.[description], PJ.[Date] ASC))  AS [Filled Value]
--		LAST_VALUE(AP.[value]) OVER( ORDER BY PJ.[description],  pj.[date] ASC) AS [LASTVALUE]
INTO [Core].[DescIDArgusPricing]
FROM [Core].[PreJoinArgusPricing] PJ
LEFT JOIN	(
				SELECT		DISTINCT [Date]
				,			[Description]
				,			[Contract/Delivery]
				,			[Time Stamp]
				,			[Price Type] 
				,			[Currency/Unit]
				,			[Delivery Mode]
				,			[Fill Type]
				,			[Value]
				FROM		[RAW].[RAW.P.Argus Pricing]

				UNION ALL

				SELECT		DISTINCT [Date] AS [Date]
				,			[Description] AS [Description]
				,			'' AS [Contract/Delivery]
				,			'' AS [Time Stamp]
				,			[Price Type] 
				,			'' AS [Currency/Unit]
				,			'' AS [Delivery Mode]
				,			'' AS [Fill Type]
				,			[Value] AS [Value]
				FROM		[RAW].[RAW.P.Reuters MGO Pricing]

				UNION ALL	

				SELECT		DISTINCT [Date] --AS [Date]
				,			[Description] --AS [Description]
				,			'' AS [Contract/Delivery]
				,			'' AS [Time Stamp]
				,			[Price Type] 
				,			'' AS [Currency/Unit]
				,			'' AS [Delivery Mode]
				,			'' AS [Fill Type]
				,			[Value] AS [Value]
				FROM		[RAW].[RAW.P.Reuters Pricing]
				WHERE		[Description] NOT LIKE 'EUR%'
				AND			[Date] IS NOT NULL
			) AP
ON	PJ.[Date]				= AP.[Date]
AND	PJ.[description]		= AP.[Description]
AND	PJ.[Contract/Delivery]	= AP.[Contract/Delivery]
AND	PJ.[Time Stamp]			= AP.[Time Stamp]
AND	PJ.[Price Type]			= AP.[Price Type]
AND	PJ.[Currency/Unit]		= AP.[Currency/Unit]
AND	PJ.[Delivery Mode]		= AP.[Delivery Mode]
AND	PJ.[Fill Type]			= AP.[Fill Type]

--36126

/***************************************************
Average Price Table Calculation*/

IF OBJECT_ID('[Core].[BiofuelArgusPricing]','U') IS NOT NULL 
		DROP TABLE [Core].[BiofuelArgusPricing]

SELECT * 
INTO [Core].[BiofuelArgusPricing] 
FROM [Core].[DescIDArgusPricing]
WHERE [Description] = 'Biofuel soybean oil Argentina vs CBOT waterborne fob San Lorenzo'

--2922

IF OBJECT_ID('[Core].[BiofuelAvgArgusPricing]','U') IS NOT NULL 
		DROP TABLE [Core].[BiofuelAvgArgusPricing]

SELECT
		[Date],
		AVG(CAST([Value] AS FLOAT)) AS [AVG_Value]
INTO [Core].[BiofuelAvgArgusPricing]
FROM [Core].[BiofuelArgusPricing]
GROUP BY [Date]
ORDER BY [Date]

--1461

IF OBJECT_ID('[Core].[BiofuelArgusPricingDone]','U') IS NOT NULL 
		DROP TABLE [Core].[BiofuelArgusPricingDone]

SELECT DISTINCT
		AP.[Date],
		AP.[Description],
		AP.[Contract/Delivery],
		AP.[Time Stamp],
		'high low avg' AS [Price Type],
		AP.[Currency/Unit],
		AP.[Delivery Mode],
		AP.[Fill Type],
		AP.[Source],
		AV.[AVG_Value] AS [Value]
INTO [Core].[BiofuelArgusPricingDone]
FROM [Core].[BiofuelArgusPricing] AP
LEFT JOIN [Core].[BiofuelAvgArgusPricing] AV
ON AV.[Date] = AP.[Date]

--1461

/***************************************************
Addition Price Table Calculation*/

IF OBJECT_ID('[Core].[SoybeanArgusPricing]','U') IS NOT NULL 
		DROP TABLE [Core].[SoybeanArgusPricing]

SELECT * 
INTO [Core].[SoybeanArgusPricing] 
FROM [Core].[DescIDArgusPricing]
WHERE [Description] = 'Biofuel soybean oil Argentina vs CBOT waterborne fob San Lorenzo' 
OR [Description] = 'Soybean oil Argentina waterborne fob upriver USD/t month'

--4014


IF OBJECT_ID('[Core].[SoybeanAddArgusPricing]','U') IS NOT NULL 
		DROP TABLE [Core].[SoybeanAddArgusPricing]

SELECT	[Date]
,		CASE WHEN [Null Flag] > 0 THEN NULL
			ELSE NULLIF((SUM(CAST(CASE WHEN [Description] LIKE 'Biofuel%' THEN '0' ELSE [Value] END AS FLOAT)) 
					+ SUM(CAST(CASE WHEN [Description] LIKE 'Soybean%' THEN '0' ELSE [Value] END AS FLOAT))/2),0)
			END AS [SUM_Value]
INTO [Core].[SoybeanAddArgusPricing]
FROM		(
				SELECT	*
				,		SUM(CASE WHEN [Value] IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) OVER (PARTITION BY [Date])	 AS [Null Flag]								
				FROM [Core].[SoybeanArgusPricing]
			) sap
GROUP BY [Date]
,		[Null Flag]
ORDER BY [Date]
		
--1461

IF OBJECT_ID('[Core].[SoybeanArgusPricingDone]','U') IS NOT NULL 
		DROP TABLE [Core].[SoybeanArgusPricingDone]

SELECT DISTINCT
		AP.[Date],
		'Soybean oil Argentina waterborne fob upriver USD/t month' AS [Description],
		'' AS [Contract/Delivery],
		AP.[Time Stamp],
		'midpoint_calc' AS [Price Type],
		AP.[Currency/Unit],
		AP.[Delivery Mode],
		AP.[Fill Type],
		AP.[Source],
		AD.[SUM_Value] AS [Value]
INTO [Core].[SoybeanArgusPricingDone]
FROM [Core].[SoybeanArgusPricing] AP
LEFT JOIN [Core].[SoybeanAddArgusPricing] AD
ON AD.[Date] = AP.[Date]


/***************************************************
Join all pre partition*/

IF OBJECT_ID('[Core].[ArgusPricingPrePrePartition]','U') IS NOT NULL 
		DROP TABLE [Core].[ArgusPricingPrePrePartition]

SELECT *
INTO [Core].[ArgusPricingPrePrePartition]
FROM [Core].[DescIDArgusPricing]
UNION ALL
SELECT *
FROM [Core].[BiofuelArgusPricingDone]
UNION ALL
SELECT *
FROM [Core].[SoybeanArgusPricingDone]


--36525

IF OBJECT_ID('[Core].[ArgusPricingPrePartition]','U') IS NOT NULL 
		DROP TABLE [Core].[ArgusPricingPrePartition]

SELECT
		*,
		CASE WHEN [Source] = 'Argus' THEN [Description]+'_'+[Price Type] ELSE [Description] END AS [Full Description]
INTO [Core].[ArgusPricingPrePartition]
FROM [Core].[ArgusPricingPrePrePartition]

--36525


/***************************************************
Loop to create description ID's*/

IF OBJECT_ID('[Core].[DescID]','U') IS NOT NULL 
		DROP TABLE [Core].[DescID]

CREATE TABLE [Core].[DescID]
([Description] NVARCHAR(128), [ID] NVARCHAR(32))

DECLARE @counter INT
DECLARE @maxcount INT
DECLARE @description NVARCHAR(128)
SET @maxcount = (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT [Full Description]) FROM [Core].[ArgusPricingPrePartition])
SET @counter = 1
DECLARE clicker CURSOR FOR

SELECT DISTINCT [Full Description] FROM [Core].[ArgusPricingPrePartition]

OPEN clicker
FETCH NEXT FROM clicker INTO @description

WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0 AND @maxcount >= @counter
BEGIN
		INSERT INTO [Core].[DescID]
		VALUES (@description,@counter)
		SET @counter = @counter + 1
		FETCH NEXT FROM clicker INTO @description
END

CLOSE clicker
DEALLOCATE clicker


/***************************************************
Join ID's to main table*/

IF OBJECT_ID('[Core].[FixedArgusPricingPrePartition]','U') IS NOT NULL 
		DROP TABLE [Core].[FixedArgusPricingPrePartition]

SELECT	PP.*,
		ID.[ID]
INTO [Core].[FixedArgusPricingPrePartition]
FROM [Core].[ArgusPricingPrePartition] PP
LEFT JOIN [Core].[DescID] ID
ON ID.[Description] = PP.[Full Description]
ORDER BY [Full Description],[Date]

--36525


/***************************************************
Fills down any missing prices using first value*/

IF OBJECT_ID('[Core].[FixedArgusPricing]','U') IS NOT NULL 
		DROP TABLE [Core].[FixedArgusPricing]

SELECT DISTINCT
		*, 
		FIRST_VALUE([Value]) OVER (PARTITION BY ID.ID, ID.[Value_Partition] ORDER BY ID.[ID], [Date]) AS [NewValue]
INTO [Core].[FixedArgusPricing]
FROM   (SELECT
			*,
			SUM(CASE WHEN [Value] IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) OVER (ORDER BY [ID], [Date]) AS [Value_Partition]
		FROM [Core].[FixedArgusPricingPrePartition]
		) AS ID
ORDER BY [ID], [Date] ASC

--38,802

--the bottom of the script aligns to point 2.6 in tom stews data marks script all be it with some neatening up to do most likely.


/***************************************************
Join fuel lookup data and FX rates*/

		IF OBJECT_ID('[Trade].[Pricing]','U') IS NOT NULL
			DROP TABLE [Trade].[Pricing]

		SELECT		fap.[Date]
		,			IIF(fap.[Value] IS NULL,1,0)		AS [Filled Down Flag]
		,			fap.[Full Description]				AS [Attribute]
		,			fap.[NewValue]						AS [Original Value] 
		,			fl.[Category]
		,			fl.[Name]
		,			fl.[UOM]							AS [Original UOM]
		,			fl.[Transport Cost]
		,			fl.[Transport UOM]
		,			fl.[Yield Assumption]
		,			fx.[EUR:USD] as [FX Rates.Eur:USD] 
		,			CASE WHEN fl.[UOM] = 'USD/t'			THEN fap.[NewValue]/fx.[EUR:USD]	ELSE fap.[NewValue] END AS [Value EUR]
		,			CASE WHEN fl.[Transport UOM] = 'USD'	THEN fl.[Transport Cost]/fx.[EUR:USD]	ELSE CASE WHEN fl.[Transport Cost] IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE fl.[Transport Cost] END END AS [Transport Cost EUR]
		,			'/mt' AS [UOM]
		INTO		[Trade].[Pricing]
		FROM		[Core].[FixedArgusPricing] fap
		LEFT JOIN	(
						SELECT		DISTINCT *
						FROM		[RAW].[RAW.P.Fuel Lookup]
					) fl
		ON			fap.[Description] = fl.[Description]
		AND			fap.[Price Type] = CASE WHEN fl.[Name] = 'SBO fob Argentina' THEN 'midpoint_calc' ELSE fl.[Price Type] END
		LEFT JOIN	(
						SELECT		[Date]	AS [Date]
						,			CASE WHEN [EUR:USD] IS NOT NULL THEN [EUR:USD] ELSE MAX([EUR:USD]) OVER (PARTITION BY [RowGroup] ORDER BY [Date]) END AS [EUR:USD]
						FROM		(
										SELECT		dl.[Date]
										,			CAST(rp.[Date] AS DATE) AS [RP Date]
										,			CAST([Value] AS DECIMAL(28,8)) AS [EUR:USD]
										,			COUNT(rp.[Date]) OVER (ORDER BY dl.[Date]) AS [RowGroup]
										FROM		[RAW].[DateList] dl
										LEFT JOIN	(
														SELECT		DISTINCT *
														FROM		[RAW].[RAW.P.Reuters Pricing]
														WHERE		[Description] LIKE 'EUR=%'
													) rp
										ON			dl.[Date] = CAST(rp.[Date] AS DATE)
									) rg
					) fx
		ON			fx.[Date] = fap.[Date]
		WHERE		fap.[NewValue] IS NOT NULL
