scripts.text:
INSERT INTO [SupplyChain].[Purchase Contracts]
	SELECT		o.[Business Unit Name]
	,			pc.[Blanket Purchase Agreement Number] 
	,			CONCAT(LEFT(pc.[Purchase Document Status],1),LOWER(SUBSTRING(pc.[Purchase Document Status],2,LEN(pc.[Purchase Document Status])-1)))		AS [Purchase Document Status]
	,			UPPER(sn.[Supplier Name])																													AS [Supplier Name]
	,			UPPER(s.[Supplier Site Name])																												AS [Supplier Site Name]
	,			pc.[Purchase Document Description]
	,			i.[Item Code]
	,			i.[Item Name]
	,			pc.[Item Description]
	,			i.[Category Code] 
	,			pc.[Unit Price] + pc.[Transporter Unit Price] + pc.[Additional Charges 1 Unit Price] + pc.[Additional Charges 2 Unit Price]
				+ ISNULL(CASE 
							WHEN p.[Shipping Method] IN ('Argent - Truck','Argent - Container','AENL - Truck','AENL - Container','Argent - Drop Ship')
								THEN (pc.[Transporter Amount] + pc.[Additional Charges 1 Amount] + pc.[Additional Charges 2 Amount])/25
							ELSE (pc.[Transporter Amount] + pc.[Additional Charges 1 Amount] + pc.[Additional Charges 2 Amount])/CASE
																																	WHEN i.[Item Code] = 'CH00006'
																																		THEN 650
																																	ELSE NULLIF(pc.[Blanket Agreement Quantity],0)
																																END
						 END,0)																																AS [Total Price]
	,			pc.[Unit Price]
	,			pc.[Purchase Document Currency]
	,			ISNULL(pc.[Blanket Agreement Quantity],0)																									AS [Blanket Agreement Quantity]
	,			pc.[UOM Code]
	,			ISNULL(dq.[Delivered Qty],0) - ISNULL(rq.[Returned Qty],0)																					AS [Delivered Quantity]
	,			ISNULL(oq.[Ordered Qty],0)																													AS [Order Quantity]
	,			ISNULL(pc.[Blanket Agreement Quantity],0) - (ISNULL(dq.[Delivered Qty],0) - ISNULL(rq.[Returned Qty],0)) - ISNULL(oq.[Ordered Qty],0)		AS [Remaining Quantity]
	,			(ISNULL(pc.[Blanket Agreement Quantity],0) - (ISNULL(dq.[Delivered Qty],0) - ISNULL(rq.[Returned Qty],0)) - ISNULL(oq.[Ordered Qty],0))/25	AS [Trucks]
	,			((ISNULL(dq.[Delivered Qty],0) - ISNULL(rq.[Returned Qty],0)) + ISNULL(oq.[Ordered Qty],0))/NULLIF(pc.[Blanket Agreement Quantity],0)		AS [Position Now]

	--          Calculation below is [Expected Position] = 1 - ([Weeks Remaining]/[Weeknumbers Contract])
	,			1 - (CAST(CASE
								WHEN CONVERT(DATE, DATEADD(DAY, 1, GETDATE() - DATEPART(DW, GETDATE()) + CASE WHEN DATEPART(DW, GETDATE()) < 1 THEN 0 ELSE 7 END )) < CAST(pc.[Agreement Start Date] AS DATE)
									THEN	CASE
												WHEN pc.[Agreement Start Date] IS NULL OR CASE
																							WHEN LEFT(i.[Item Code],2) = 'CH' AND pc.[Agreement End Date] IS NULL AND pc.[Agreement Start Date] IS NOT NULL
																								THEN CONCAT(YEAR(pc.[Agreement Start Date]),'-12-31')
																							ELSE pc.[Agreement End Date]
																						END IS NULL
													THEN 0
												ELSE DATEDIFF(DAY,pc.[Agreement Start Date],CASE
																								WHEN LEFT(i.[Item Code],2) = 'CH' AND pc.[Agreement End Date] IS NULL AND pc.[Agreement Start Date] <> NULL
																									THEN CONCAT(YEAR(pc.[Agreement Start Date]),'-12-31')
																								ELSE pc.[Agreement End Date]
																							END)/7
											END
								WHEN CONVERT(DATE, DATEADD(DAY, 1, GETDATE() - DATEPART(DW, GETDATE()) + CASE WHEN DATEPART(DW, GETDATE()) < 1 THEN 0 ELSE 7 END )) > CAST(CASE
																																												WHEN LEFT(i.[Item Code],2) = 'CH' AND pc.[Agreement End Date] IS NULL AND pc.[Agreement Start Date] IS NOT NULL
																																													THEN CONCAT(YEAR(pc.[Agreement Start Date]),'-12-31')
																																												ELSE pc.[Agreement End Date]
																																											END AS DATE)
									THEN 0
								ELSE DATEDIFF(DAY,CONVERT(DATE, DATEADD(DAY, 1, GETDATE() - DATEPART(DW, GETDATE()) + CASE WHEN DATEPART(DW, GETDATE()) < 1 THEN 0 ELSE 7 END )),CAST(CASE
																																															WHEN LEFT(i.[Item Code],2) = 'CH' AND pc.[Agreement End Date] IS NULL AND pc.[Agreement Start Date] IS NOT NULL
																																																THEN CONCAT(YEAR(pc.[Agreement Start Date]),'-12-31')
																																															ELSE pc.[Agreement End Date]
																																														END AS DATE))/7
						  END AS DECIMAL(28,2))					
					/CAST(NULLIF(CASE
									WHEN pc.[Agreement Start Date] IS NULL OR CASE
																				WHEN LEFT(i.[Item Code],2) = 'CH' AND pc.[Agreement End Date] IS NULL AND pc.[Agreement Start Date] IS NOT NULL
																					THEN CONCAT(YEAR(pc.[Agreement Start Date]),'-12-31')
																				ELSE pc.[Agreement End Date]
																			END IS NULL
										THEN 0
									ELSE DATEDIFF(DAY,pc.[Agreement Start Date],CASE
																					WHEN LEFT(i.[Item Code],2) = 'CH' AND pc.[Agreement End Date] IS NULL AND pc.[Agreement Start Date] IS NOT NULL
																						THEN CONCAT(YEAR(pc.[Agreement Start Date]),'-12-31')
																					ELSE pc.[Agreement End Date]
																				END)/7
								END,0) AS DECIMAL(28,2)))																								AS [Expected Position]

	-- [Weeknumbers Contract] is calculated below as difference between [Agreement Start Date] and [Agreement End Date]

	,			CASE
					WHEN pc.[Agreement Start Date] IS NULL OR CASE
																WHEN LEFT(i.[Item Code],2) = 'CH' AND pc.[Agreement End Date] IS NULL AND pc.[Agreement Start Date] IS NOT NULL
																	THEN CONCAT(YEAR(pc.[Agreement Start Date]),'-12-31')
																ELSE pc.[Agreement End Date]
															END IS NULL
						THEN 0
					ELSE DATEDIFF(DAY,pc.[Agreement Start Date],CASE
																	WHEN LEFT(i.[Item Code],2) = 'CH' AND pc.[Agreement End Date] IS NULL AND pc.[Agreement Start Date] IS NOT NULL
																		THEN CONCAT(YEAR(pc.[Agreement Start Date]),'-12-31')
																	ELSE pc.[Agreement End Date]
																END)/7
				END																																		AS [Weeknumbers Contract]

	-- [Weeks Remaining] is calculated below as		- Difference between [Agreement Start Date and [Agreement End Date] if GETDATE() < [Agreement Start Date]
	--												- 0 if GETDATE() > [Agreement End Date]
	--												- ELSE difference between [Next Monday] and [Agreement End Date]


	,			CASE
					WHEN CONVERT(DATE, DATEADD(DAY, 1, GETDATE() - DATEPART(DW, GETDATE()) + CASE WHEN DATEPART(DW, GETDATE()) < 1 THEN 0 ELSE 7 END )) < CAST(pc.[Agreement Start Date] AS DATE)
						 THEN	CASE
									WHEN pc.[Agreement Start Date] = '' OR CASE
																				WHEN LEFT(i.[Item Code],2) = 'CH' AND pc.[Agreement End Date] IS NULL AND pc.[Agreement Start Date] IS NOT NULL
																					THEN CONCAT(YEAR(pc.[Agreement Start Date]),'-12-31')
																				ELSE pc.[Agreement End Date]
																			END IS NULL
										THEN 0
									ELSE DATEDIFF(DAY,pc.[Agreement Start Date],CASE
																					WHEN LEFT(i.[Item Code],2) = 'CH' AND pc.[Agreement End Date] IS NULL AND pc.[Agreement Start Date] IS NOT NULL
																						THEN CONCAT(YEAR(pc.[Agreement Start Date]),'-12-31')
																					ELSE pc.[Agreement End Date]
																				END)/7
								END
					WHEN CONVERT(DATE, DATEADD(DAY, 1, GETDATE() - DATEPART(DW, GETDATE()) + CASE WHEN DATEPART(DW, GETDATE()) < 1 THEN 0 ELSE 7 END )) > CAST(CASE
																																									WHEN LEFT(i.[Item Code],2) = 'CH' AND pc.[Agreement End Date] IS NULL AND pc.[Agreement Start Date] IS NOT NULL
																																										THEN CONCAT(YEAR(pc.[Agreement Start Date]),'-12-31')
																																									ELSE pc.[Agreement End Date]
																																								END AS DATE)
						 THEN 0
					ELSE DATEDIFF(DAY,CONVERT(DATE, DATEADD(DAY, 1, GETDATE() - DATEPART(DW, GETDATE()) + CASE WHEN DATEPART(DW, GETDATE()) < 1 THEN 0 ELSE 7 END )),CAST(CASE
																																												WHEN LEFT(i.[Item Code],2) = 'CH' AND pc.[Agreement End Date] IS NULL AND pc.[Agreement Start Date] IS NOT NULL
																																													THEN CONCAT(YEAR(pc.[Agreement Start Date]),'-12-31')
																																												ELSE pc.[Agreement End Date]
																																											END AS DATE))/7
				END																																		AS [Weeks Remaining]

	,			CONVERT(DATE, DATEADD(DAY, 1, GETDATE() - DATEPART(DW, GETDATE()) + CASE WHEN DATEPART(DW, GETDATE()) < 1 THEN 0 ELSE 7 END ))			AS [Next Monday]
	,			pc.[Agreement Start Date]
	,			CASE
					WHEN LEFT(i.[Item Code],2) = 'CH' AND pc.[Agreement End Date] IS NULL AND pc.[Agreement Start Date] IS NOT NULL
						THEN CONCAT(YEAR(pc.[Agreement Start Date]),'-12-31')
					ELSE pc.[Agreement End Date]
				END																																		AS [Agreement End Date]
	,			p.[Shipping Method]
	,			pc.[Incoterm]
	,			pc.[Transporter Name]
	,			pc.[Transporter Unit Price]
	,			pc.[Transporter Amount]
	,			pc.[Transporter Currency]
	,			pc.[Additional Charges 1 Supplier]	
	,			pc.[Additional Charges 1 Unit Price]
	,			pc.[Additional Charges 1 Amount]
	,			pc.[Additional Charges 1 Currency]
	,			pc.[Additional Charges 2 Supplier]	
	,			pc.[Additional Charges 2 Unit Price]
	,			pc.[Additional Charges 2 Amount]
	,			pc.[Additional Charges 2 Currency]
	,			u.[Username]																															AS [Buyer]
	,			pc.[Sustainability Position]
	,			pc.[Supplier Item]
	,			pc.[Deal Date]
	,			pc.[Agreement Amount]
	,			pc.[Amount Released Against Agreement]
	,			pc.[Note To Vendor]
	,			pc.[FFA Spec]			
	,			pc.[Line Status]
	,			fx.[EUR USD]
	,			fx.[EUR GBP]
	,			CASE
					WHEN CASE	WHEN LEFT(i.[Item Code],2) = 'CH' AND pc.[Agreement End Date] IS NULL AND pc.[Agreement Start Date] IS NOT NULL THEN CONCAT(YEAR(pc.[Agreement Start Date]),'-12-31') ELSE pc.[Agreement End Date]  END IS NULL


					THEN CONCAT(LEFT(pc.[Purchase Document Status],1),LOWER(SUBSTRING(pc.[Purchase Document Status],2,LEN(pc.[Purchase Document Status])-1)))
					
					WHEN pc.[Purchase Document Status] not in ('closed' ,'finally closed', 'canceled') AND CAST(CASE WHEN LEFT(i.[Item Code],2) = 'CH' AND pc.[Agreement End Date] IS NULL AND pc.[Agreement Start Date] IS NOT NULL THEN CONCAT(YEAR(pc.[Agreement Start Date]),'-12-31') ELSE pc.[Agreement End Date] END AS DATE) < GETDATE()
						THEN 'Closed'
					ELSE CONCAT(LEFT(pc.[Purchase Document Status],1),LOWER(SUBSTRING(pc.[Purchase Document Status],2,LEN(pc.[Purchase Document Status])-1)))
				END																																				AS [Updated Contract Status]
	,			CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE)																															AS [DateStamp]
	,			ISNULL(pc.[Blanket Agreement Quantity],0) * ISNULL(ISNULL(y.[Expected yield],av.[Average Yield]),av2.[Average Yield])							AS [Yield Adjusted Volume]
	,			CAST(ISNULL(ISNULL(DATEADD(d,DATEDIFF(d,pc.[Agreement Start Date],CASE
																			 	  WHEN LEFT(i.[Item Code],2) = 'CH' AND pc.[Agreement End Date] IS NULL AND pc.[Agreement Start Date] IS NOT NULL
																			 		THEN CONCAT(YEAR(pc.[Agreement Start Date]),'-12-31')
																			 	  ELSE pc.[Agreement End Date]
																			 END)/2,pc.[Agreement Start Date]),pc.[Agreement Start Date]),CASE
																																		  	  WHEN LEFT(i.[Item Code],2) = 'CH' AND pc.[Agreement End Date] IS NULL AND pc.[Agreement Start Date] IS NOT NULL
																																		  		THEN CONCAT(YEAR(pc.[Agreement Start Date]),'-12-31')
																																		  	  ELSE pc.[Agreement End Date]
																																		  END) AS DATE)			AS [Agreement Mid Date]	
	,			ISNULL(pc.[Blanket Agreement Quantity],0) - (ISNULL(dq.[Delivered Qty],0) - ISNULL(rq.[Returned Qty],0))										AS [Non-Delivered Quantity]
	,			(ISNULL(pc.[Blanket Agreement Quantity],0) - (ISNULL(dq.[Delivered Qty],0) - ISNULL(rq.[Returned Qty],0)))
					* ISNULL(ISNULL(y.[Expected yield],av.[Average Yield]),av2.[Average Yield])																	AS [Yield Adjusted Volume Non-Delivered]



	--SELECT		[o].[Business Unit Name]
	--,			COUNT(1)
	FROM		[Core].[PurchaseContracts] pc
	LEFT JOIN	[Core].[Suppliers] s
	ON			pc.[Supplier] = s.[Vendor ID]
	AND			pc.[Vendor Site ID] = s.[Vendor Site ID]
	LEFT JOIN	(
					SELECT		[Party ID] 
					,			MIN([Party Name])	AS [Supplier Name]
					FROM		[Core].[Parties]
					GROUP BY	[Party ID]
				) sn
	ON			s.[Party ID] = sn.[Party ID]
	LEFT JOIN	(
					SELECT		[Business Unit ID]
					,			[Business Unit Name]
					FROM		[Core].[Organizations]
					GROUP BY	[Business Unit ID]
					,			[Business Unit Name]
				) o
	ON			pc.[Purchasing BU] = o.[Business Unit ID]
	LEFT JOIN	(
					SELECT		[Item Code]
					,			[Inventory Item ID]
					,			[Category Code]
					,			MIN([Item Name])	AS [Item Name]
					FROM		[Core].[Items]
					GROUP BY	[Item Code]
					,			[Inventory Item ID]
					,			[Category Code]
				) i 
	ON			i.[Inventory Item ID] = pc.[Item ID]
	LEFT JOIN	(
					SELECT		[Party ID]
					,			MIN([Party Name])	AS [Shipping Method]
					FROM		[Core].[Parties]
					GROUP BY	[Party ID]
				) p
	ON			pc.[Carrier ID] = p.[Party ID]
	LEFT JOIN	(
					SELECT		[From Header ID]
					,			SUM(ISNULL(CAST(CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(rt.[Primary Quantity])) IS NULL THEN '0' ELSE LTRIM(RTRIM(rt.[Primary Quantity])) END AS NUMERIC(28,8)),0)) AS [Delivered Qty]
					FROM		[Core].[PurchaseOrders] po
					LEFT JOIN	[Core].[ReceivingTransactions] rt
					ON			rt.[PO Line ID] = po.[PO Line ID]
					WHERE		rt.[Destination Type Code] = 'INVENTORY'
					AND			po.[Line Status] NOT IN ('OPEN','CANCELED','CLOSED FOR INVOICING')
					AND			rt.[Transaction Type] <> 'RETURN TO RECEIVING'
					GROUP BY	[From Header ID]
				) dq
	ON			dq.[From Header ID] = pc.[PO Header ID]
	LEFT JOIN	(
					SELECT		[From Header ID]
					,			SUM(ISNULL(CAST(CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(rt.[Primary Quantity])) IS NULL THEN '0' ELSE LTRIM(RTRIM(rt.[Primary Quantity])) END AS NUMERIC(28,8)),0)) AS [Returned Qty]
					FROM		[Core].[PurchaseOrders] po
					LEFT JOIN	[Core].[ReceivingTransactions] rt
					ON			rt.[PO Line ID] = po.[PO Line ID]
					WHERE		rt.[Destination Type Code] = 'INVENTORY'
					AND			po.[Line Status] NOT IN ('OPEN','CANCELED','CLOSED FOR INVOICING')
					AND			rt.[Transaction Type] = 'RETURN TO RECEIVING'
					GROUP BY	[From Header ID]
				) rq
	ON			rq.[From Header ID] = pc.[PO Header ID]
	LEFT JOIN	(
					SELECT		[From Header ID]
					,			SUM(ISNULL(CAST(CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM([Ordered Quantity])) IS NULL THEN '0' ELSE LTRIM(RTRIM([Ordered Quantity])) END AS NUMERIC(28,8)),0)) AS [Ordered Qty]
					FROM		[Core].[PurchaseOrders]
					WHERE		[Line Status] IN ('OPEN','CLOSED FOR INVOICING')
					GROUP BY	[From Header ID]
				) oq
	ON			oq.[From Header ID] = pc.[PO Header ID]
	LEFT JOIN	[Core].[Users] u
	ON			pc.[Buyer] = u.[Person ID]
	LEFT JOIN	[Core].[FXRates] fx
	ON			CAST(pc.[Agreement Start Date] AS DATE) = CAST(fx.[CONVERSION_DATE] AS DATE)
	LEFT JOIN	[Trade].[Yield] y
	ON			o.[Business Unit Name] = y.[Business Unit]
	AND			CASE WHEN i.[Category Code] = 'Feedstock.TallowABP' THEN 'Feedstock.Tallow' ELSE i.[Category Code] END = y.[Item Category]
	AND			(CASE WHEN YEAR(CAST(pc.[Agreement Start Date] AS DATE)) < 2020 THEN CAST('2020-01-01' AS DATE)
					 ELSE CAST(pc.[Agreement Start Date] AS DATE)
				END BETWEEN y.[Start Date] AND y.[End date] OR (pc.[Agreement Start Date] > y.[Start Date] AND y.[End date] IS NULL))
	LEFT JOIN	(
						SELECT		DISTINCT [Business Unit]
						,			[Start date]
						,			[End date]
						,			AVG(CAST([Expected yield] AS DECIMAL(28,8)))OVER(PARTITION BY [Business Unit], [Start date]) AS [Average Yield]
						FROM		[Trade].[Yield]	
				) av
	ON			o.[Business Unit Name] = av.[Business Unit]
	AND			CASE WHEN YEAR(CAST(pc.[Agreement Start Date] AS DATE)) < 2020 THEN CAST('2020-01-01' AS DATE)
					 ELSE CAST(pc.[Agreement Start Date] AS DATE)
				END BETWEEN av.[Start Date] AND ISNULL(av.[End date],CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE))
	LEFT JOIN	(
						SELECT		DISTINCT [Business Unit]
						,			[Start date]
						,			[End date]
						,			AVG(CAST([Expected yield] AS DECIMAL(28,8)))OVER(PARTITION BY [Business Unit], [Start date]) AS [Average Yield]
						FROM		[Trade].[Yield]	
						WHERE		CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE) BETWEEN [Start Date] AND ISNULL([End date],CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE))
				) av2
	ON			o.[Business Unit Name] = av2.[Business Unit]
	WHERE		o.[Business Unit Name] NOT IN ('ROTIE BU','Quatra BU')
	AND			pc.[Blanket Purchase Agreement Number] NOT IN (
																	SELECT		DISTINCT [Blanket Purchase Agreement Number]
																	FROM		[Core].[PurchaseContracts]
																	WHERE		[Amount Released Against Agreement] = 0
																	AND			[Agreement End Date] < '2021-07-01'
															   ) 	



	INSERT INTO [SupplyChain].[Purchase Contracts]			
	SELECT		o.[Business Unit Name]
	,			sc.[Sales Contract Number]
	,			sc.[Sales Contract Version]
	,			REPLACE(CONCAT(LEFT(sc.[Sales Contract Status],1),LOWER(SUBSTRING(sc.[Sales Contract Status],2,LEN(sc.[Sales Contract Status])-1))),'_',' ')	AS [Sales Contract Status]
	,			UPPER(c.[Customer])																																AS [Customer]
	,			c.[Customer Number]
	,			UPPER(sc.[Customer Bill To])																													AS [Customer Bill To]
	,			UPPER(sc.[Customer Ship To])																													AS [Customer Ship To]
	,			sc.[Description]
	,			sc.[Additional Description]
	,			sc.[Item Name]
	,			i.[Item Name]	AS [Item Description]
	,			i.[Category Code]
	,			CAST(CASE WHEN sc.[Agreement Price] IS NULL THEN '0' ELSE sc.[Agreement Price] END AS NUMERIC(28,8)) 
				- CAST(CASE WHEN sc.[Transporter Unit Price] IS NULL THEN '0' ELSE sc.[Transporter Unit Price] END AS NUMERIC(28,2))
				- CAST(CASE WHEN sc.[Additional Charges 1 Unit Price] IS NULL THEN '0' ELSE sc.[Additional Charges 1 Unit Price] END AS NUMERIC(28,2))
				- CAST(CASE WHEN sc.[Additional Charges 2 Unit Price] IS NULL THEN '0' ELSE sc.[Additional Charges 2 Unit Price] END AS NUMERIC(28,2))		AS [Total Price per tonne]
	,			(CAST(CASE WHEN sc.[Transporter Amount] IS NULL THEN '0' ELSE sc.[Transporter Amount] END AS NUMERIC(28,2))
				+ CAST(CASE WHEN sc.[Additional Charges 1 Amount] IS NULL THEN '0' ELSE sc.[Additional Charges 1 Amount] END AS NUMERIC(28,2))
				+ CAST(CASE WHEN sc.[Additional Charges 2 Amount] IS NULL THEN '0' ELSE sc.[Additional Charges 2 Amount] END AS NUMERIC(28,2))) * (-1)		AS [Add. Cost per Transport]
	,			sc.[Currency Code]
	,			CASE
					WHEN sc.[Line Quantity] IS NULL
						THEN CAST(CASE WHEN sc.[Line Amount] IS NULL THEN '0' ELSE sc.[Line Amount] END AS NUMERIC(28,2))/NULLIF(CAST(CASE WHEN sc.[Agreement Price] IS NULL THEN '0' ELSE sc.[Agreement Price] END AS NUMERIC(28,2)),0)
					ELSE CAST(sc.[Line Quantity] AS NUMERIC(28,2))
				END																																			AS [Line Quantity]
	,			sc.[UOM Code]
	,			sc.[Line Start Date]
	,			sc.[Line End Date]
	,			sc.[Shipping Method]
	,			sc.[Incoterm]
	,			o.[Business Unit Name]								AS [Seller]
	,			ISNULL(q.[Order Quantity],0)						AS [Order Quantity]	
	,			ISNULL(q.[Shipped Quantity],0)						AS [Shipped Quantity]
	,			sc.[Line Amount]
	,			sc.[Agreement Price]
	,			sc.[Transporter]
	,			sc.[Transporter Unit Price]
	,			sc.[Transporter Amount]
	,			sc.[Transporter Currency]
	,			sc.[Additional Charges 1 Supplier]
	,			sc.[Additional Charges 1 Description]
	,			sc.[Additional Charges 1 Unit Price]
	,			sc.[Additional Charges 1 Amount]
	,			sc.[Additional Charges 1 Currency]
	,			sc.[Additional Charges 2 Supplier]
	,			sc.[Additional Charges 2 Description]
	,			sc.[Additional Charges 2 Unit Price]
	,			sc.[Additional Charges 2 Amount]
	,			sc.[Additional Charges 2 Currency]
	,			sc.[Trader]
	,			sc.[Deal Date]
	,			sc.[Payment Term]
	,			sc.[Tolerance]
	,			sc.[Laycan]
	,			sc.[Sustainability Contact]
	,			sc.[Sustainability Position]
	,			sc.[Sustainability Position Details]
	,			sc.[Quality]
	,			sc.[Temperature]
	,			sc.[Nomination]
	,			sc.[Nomination Requirement]	
	,			sc.[Lay Time]
	,			sc.[Inspection]
	,			sc.[Detenation Demurrage]
	,			sc.[Demurrage Vessel]
	,			sc.[Legislation]
	,			sc.[Disposal Method]
	,			sc.[Waste Stream Number]
	,			sc.[Waste Description]
	,			sc.[VET ID]
	,			fx.[EUR USD]
	,			fx.[EUR GBP]
	,			CASE
					WHEN sc.[Sales Contract Status] not in ('Closed', 'Caneled','Finally closed', 'expired') AND ISDATE([Line End Date]) = 1 AND CAST([Line End Date] AS DATE) < GETDATE()
						THEN 'Closed'
					ELSE sc.[Sales Contract Status]
				END																																		AS [Updated Contract Status]
	,			CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE)																													AS [DateStamp]
	,			CASE
					WHEN sc.[Line Quantity] IS NULL
						THEN CAST(CASE WHEN sc.[Line Amount] IS NULL THEN '0' ELSE sc.[Line Amount] END AS NUMERIC(28,2))/NULLIF(CAST(CASE WHEN sc.[Agreement Price] IS NULL THEN '0' ELSE sc.[Agreement Price] END AS NUMERIC(28,2)),0)
					ELSE CAST(sc.[Line Quantity] AS NUMERIC(28,2))
				END - ISNULL(q.[Shipped Quantity],0)				AS [Volume Non-Delivered]
	,			CAST(ISNULL(ISNULL(DATEADD(d,DATEDIFF(d,sc.[Line Start Date],sc.[Line End Date])/2,sc.[Line Start Date]),sc.[Line Start Date]),sc.[Line End Date]) AS DATE) AS [Line Mid Date]
	FROM		[Core].[SalesContracts] sc
	LEFT JOIN	(
					SELECT		[Party ID]
					,			[Party Number]		AS [Customer Number]
					,			MIN([Party Name])	AS [Customer]
					FROM		[Core].[Parties]
					GROUP BY	[Party ID]
					,			[Party Number]
				) c
	ON			sc.[Sales Contract Customer] = c.[Party ID]
	LEFT JOIN	(
					SELECT		[Business Unit ID]
					,			[Business Unit Name]
					FROM		[Core].[Organizations]
					GROUP BY	[Business Unit ID]
					,			[Business Unit Name]
				) o
	ON			sc.[Business Unit] = o.[Business Unit ID]
	LEFT JOIN	(
					SELECT		[Item Code]
					,			[Item Name]
					,			[Category Code]
					FROM		[Core].[Items] 
					WHERE		[Organization ID] = '300000001513519' --Master Stock List
					GROUP BY	[Item Code]
					,			[Item Name]
					,			[Category Code]
				) i
	ON			i.[Item Code] = sc.[Item Name]
	LEFT JOIN	(
					SELECT		sc.[Contract Header ID]
					,			sc.[Line ID]
					,			SUM(CAST(sof.[FULFILLED_QTY] AS NUMERIC(28,2)) - 2*CAST(sof.[RMA_DELIVERED_QTY] AS NUMERIC(28,2)))	AS [Shipped Quantity]
					,			SUM(CAST(sof.[ORDERED_QTY] AS NUMERIC(28,2)) - CAST(sof.[FULFILLED_QTY] AS NUMERIC(28,2)))			AS [Order Quantity]
					FROM		[Core].[SalesContracts] sc
					LEFT JOIN	[Core].[SalesOrders_Fulfilled] sof
					ON			sc.[Contract Header ID] = sof.[AGREEMENT_HEADER_ID]
					AND			sc.[Line ID] = sof.[AGREEMENT_LINE_ID]
					WHERE		sc.[Version Type] = 'C'
					AND			sof.[ORDERED_UOM] = 'TN'
					AND			sof.[REFERENCE_FLINE_ID] IS NULL
					GROUP BY	sc.[Contract Header ID]
					,			sc.[Line ID]
				) q	
	ON			sc.[Contract Header ID] = q.[Contract Header ID]
	AND			sc.[Line ID] = q.[Line ID]
	LEFT JOIN	[Core].[FXRates] fx
	ON			CAST(sc.[Line Start Date] AS DATE) = CAST(fx.[CONVERSION_DATE] AS DATE)
	WHERE		[Version Type] = 'C'
	AND			o.[Business Unit Name] NOT IN ('ROTIE BU','Quatra BU')
